But wait, there's more! * Learn the 3 best warm up exercises to avoid injury. * Spice up your cardio routine and tap the pounds off. * Be the life of any party by showing off your new-found tap skills. * Tap dance your blues away with our fun, engaging host, Tahlia. And even more! * Over 20 years of tap experience compiled into one concise app. * Choreograph your own dance show with combinations you create. * Find the secret to balancing during heel turns and toe stands. * Learn the basics of tap at your pace in the comfort of your home. Rediscover the lost art of tap-dancing with the How to Tap Dance app!

Keep the skies safe in Flight Control, the insanely addictive worldwide hit! It only takes a minute to learn but you won’t be able to put it down. Guide aircraft to their landing zones but don’t let them collide! Sounds easy? You’ll need smart strategy and keen eyes to alter flight paths as needed and keep the chaos under control. Your travel itinerary is packed with multiple airfields, 10 aircraft including jets and helicopters and stat-tracking. Pack your bags for addictive airline action! - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - WHAT THE PRESS SAYS **148Apps 5/5: "…a terrific little game. It’s easy, fun for all ages and addictive enough to keep you wanting more." **Touch Arcade: "…the winning balance of easy pick-up gameplay, ramping difficulty and tickling the need to try 'just one more time'" - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - Air traffic control is the world’s most stressful job, but not for you. You don’t need heading angles, flight rules or meteorological reports, you’re a natural! A prodigy! A born controller! There are 5 unique airfields and 10 different aircraft, including planes, helicopters and military jets. • Earn your wings on the beloved original map that started it all! • Coast into a relaxing beachside resort and guide jets, helicopters and seaplanes safely towards their landing zones. • Take the helm of an aircraft carrier and command speedy military jets and helicopters. • Venture into the Australian Outback featuring an emergency air ambulance plane that can’t be controlled. • Grab the reins in a snowy winter wonderland where drifting snow and a windsock show the prevailing wind direction. Keep an eye on the wind! Runways will close and reopen accordingly. - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - So welcome aboard, please sit back, fasten your seatbelt and enjoy the mayhem – buy Flight Control now! - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - **GET MORE GREAT NAMCO Android Games! ** PAC-MAN, Ms. PAC-MAN, Crush the Castle, PAC-MAN Championship Edition and more! TimeClock makes it easy to track your billable hours and expenses - and then use this data to generate invoices or spreadsheets. It's the perfect Android time tracker for freelancers, independent contractors, attorneys or anyone who bills clients by the hour. * Satisfied users: over 1700 ratings on the Android Market with an average of 4.5 out of 5 stars. * Simple and intuitive: you'll be tracking your billable hours and expenses within minutes of installing the app. * Safe and dependable: on the Market since 2009, TimeClock is rock solid and trusted by thousands of users around the world. TimeClock works great as a standalone app, but you can also sign up for a free TimeClock Connect account, which gives you: * Instant, automatic back-up for peace of mind: no matter what happens your phone, your data is always safe and accessible online. * Instant syncing with multiple devices - use both your phone and tablet. * A better way to view and manage your data: looking at data on your laptop or desktop is easier than using a small mobile display. * Optional invoice system: the easiest way to create professional looking invoices directly from your TimeClock data - no more spreadsheets! More information about invoices can be found below. More TimeClock Features: * Export directly to Dropbox or Google Drive (Google Docs) - or send your export file via email. * Export your data as a spreadsheet (CSV) or as "human readable" HTML. * Track hours for as many clients as you wish. Set your hourly rate for each client and TimeClock will calculate your earnings. * Round your work times by specifying an optional billing increment for each client - from one minute up to one hour. * Flat fee activities are supported where the client is charged a fixed amount for a job regardless of the time worked. * Track your time as you're working by clocking in and clocking out - or manually enter complete time records in the past or future. * Powerful note entry / management capabilities. * Track Expenses along with your billable hours. Set up predefined expenses for recurring expense items. Manage and export your expenses from the app or from your TimeClock Connect account. * Track Mileage Expenses by providing a mileage reimbursement allowance and then entering the distance travelled OR providing starting and ending odometer readings. * View and edit all time records within the app. You can go back and change the start and end times, billing rate, notes - any field can be edited. * Customize your spreadsheet export: you pick which data columns are exported, the order of the columns and the type of summary information. * Each time record contains: client, notes and a secondary data field that defaults to "Project", but you can change this to whatever suits your business: Location, Task, Job etc. * While working, you may quit the app or even turn off the phone - the time will be tracked until you restart the app and stop the timer. * SD Card database backup / restore * Note: TimeClock does not automatically calculate overtime nor does it support multiple simultaneous timers. Invoice System Features: + Simple, easy to use web interface. + Create new invoices in just a few clicks using your time records and expenses synced from the app. You won't believe how quick and easy it is! + Payment tracking - including partial payments. + Bill for materials as well as labor - items can be taxed at different rates. + Complete invoice lifecycle history log for each invoice. + Customize your invoices with your company logo. + Download PDF files to print - or email them to clients from within TimeClock Connect. + Try it free for 30 days. Afterwards, it's only $5/month for unlimited invoices.
release_text: New in this release: + You can now add, edit and manage clients from TimeClockConnect.com + Bug fixes. Thanks for using TimeClock.

description: A mix of mind expanding visuals like "Illusion mindscape", "Cyborg fungus", "Maya prophecy", "Earthquake on Neptune", "Shaman's wheel" and "Akashic record reader" are included. This app records video in background while your device is blocked or other app is running. Record with back or front camera. You can make and receive phone calls while recording (Some devices record the conversation). You can use others applications while recording. The device does not plays any sound when the recording starts or stops (Some devices do not support this depending on your country laws) You can choose the folder where you want to save your videos. The app creates an icon called "folder" in your desktop , pressing that icon starts or stops the recording, only you know that the device is recording . A notification appears at the top left corner of the screen while recording. You can delete the shortcut, and if you need it afterwards, you can create another one . Open the destination folder of the video recordings and watch inside the app, in menu > open folder This app allows you to make video recordings and the people around will not notice it. Once the recording is started you can use the others app in your phone, even receive and make phone calls, or lock the screen. The device does not plays any sound, you only notice the start or stop recording when you have it in your hand with a little vibration. First of all make sure that you choose a camera resolution supported by the camera you have choosen, otherwise the recording could fail.You can check it in you device specifications.
release_text: new ui compatibitlity for android 4+, action bar displayed with create shortcut and open videos folder, you can watch the videos from inside the app

Naviga nel menu principale per accedere in modo semplice e rapido alle principali funzionalità informative e dispositive quali: - Consultare il saldo del tuo conto corrente Barclays; - Consultare l’elenco delle transazioni effettuate; - Effettuare bonifici in Italia e all’estero; - Effettuare una ricarica telefonica; - Pagare Bollettini Postali, MAV, RAV; - Consultare e gestire il tuo portafoglio investimenti, acquistando e vendendo titoli; - Seguire l’andamento dei mercati azionari e dei cambi, grazie anche alle news dai mercati; - Creare e gestire watchlist per seguire i tuoi titoli preferiti ; - Ricercare le filiali e gli ATM Barclays in Italia. - Gestire i tuoi dati personali e modificare i massimali per il prelievo Bancomat; Per operare con Barclays Mobile Banking è necessario accettare al primo accesso i termini e le condizioni del Servizio Barclays Mobile Banking. L’accesso alle funzionalità di trading è legato alla tipologia di profilo dell’utente sulla base del contratto di trading sottoscritto. " "Download this free application Barclays Mobile Banking to manage your account immediately and your investments directly from your smartphone. Navigate the main menu to access quickly and easily to the main features and dispositive information such as: - Check the balance of your checking account Barclays; - See the list of transactions; - Transfer funds in Italy and abroad; - Make a phone recharge; - Pay Bulletins Post, MAV, RAV; - View and manage your investment portfolio, buying and selling securities; - Follow the trend of stock markets and exchange rates, thanks to the news from the markets; - Create watchlist to track and manage your favorite stocks; - Search for branches and ATM Barclays in Italy. - Manage your personal information and change the limits for ATM withdrawal; To work with Barclays Mobile Banking you must accept when you first access the terms and conditions of the Service Barclays Mobile Banking. Access to trading functionality is related to the type of user profile based on the contract signed trading. "

description: Tiny app to process URLs to start tasker tasks. Useful for launching tasker tasks from NFC tags- THIS APP REQUIRES THE TASKER APP TO BE INSTALLED! INSTRUCTIONS: for Sony Xperia smarttags simply use the the smart tag app. To run a tasker task use the "Open URL" action, then set the url "tasker://taskname" instead of "http://" (change taskname to the name of your task defined in tasker- tasks are case sensitive) e.g. "tasker://mytask" to run a task called "mytask" defined in tasker. for writable tags it should work as simply as writing the tasker:// url and task to the tag itself. It will do until tasker add nfc capability :) On some devices the "tags" app comes pre-installed and blocks the url from nfc tags from being launched automagically, meaning you need to touch the screen to launch the task. You may find disabling the "tags" app from settings->apps->all fixes this problem. Also it is VITAL that tasker is installed before this app or it will not work, this means that if you upgrade or reset your device etc. and google play automatically re-installs all your apps then it may not work. this is solved by simply uninstalling tasker url launcher, checking tasker is installed, and then re-installing the tasker url launcher from google play.

Portugal News is a fast and easy way to read news on Android. It gives you easy access to read the most popular newspapers from Portugal. Newspapers available: Público, Jornal de Notícias, Expresso, Diário de Notícias, Record, A Bola, TechTuga, Sapo, O Jogo, Caras, Diário Digital, Mais Futebol, Visão, Jornal de Negócios, Económico, Máxima... Features: * Favorites * Remove or sort news sources * Edit default news sources * Subscribe more news sources via RSS * Option to block images (reduce bandwidth). * Share news via SMS, Email, Facebook, Twitter...

Your perfect tour guide with GPS mapping applications and detailed information about the Franconian cities. Travel Tips for your holiday in the Franconian cities (accommodations, parks & gardens, events, attractions, etc.) and many important addresses (tourist information, etc.). Franken as a travel destination. Wide natural landscapes, sleepy villages and historic towns. The Frankish towns and cities create special cultural, architectural and culinary highlights. The app overview / detailed information: Host, events, tourism places, tips, Attractions and updates! 14 Franconian cities: The Frankish cities present their own unique character in each case: history, culture, cuisine.    Major Events: High-profile events, cultural events and exhibitions inspire tourists. Everything about "Parks & Gardens" in the Franconian cities: In the parks and gardens, the Franconian city of its most prosperous and most beautiful show. Masterly Garden Architecture, verdant diversity and sense of beauty combine to resting places in the city life. Currently available maps: * Bayern / Franken Topographic maps: * State of Bavaria (up to TK 1: 10.000) Aerial photos on LVG Bayern * State of Bavaria Additional Maps: * Aerial photos via Microsoft Bing Maps (100cm / pixel) * Road maps of Open Street Maps (Cloudmade) Publisher / Contacts: Franconia Tourism Tourism francs e.V. PO Box 440453 D-90209 Nuremberg Tel .: +49 / (0) 911 / 94151-0 info@frankentourismus.de Parts of this site was co-financed by the EU. This application builds on the interactive maps framework eContent.Maps the hubermedia GmbH. Information, see http://iphone.hubermedia.de . Contact us if you have any questions or suggestions support@hubermedia.de . Website of Tourism Franconia (www.die-fraenkischen-staedte.de) The Franconian cities

Love taking pictures? Love organizing your pictures? Don’t you wish your existing DSLR or point-and-shoot camera had the ability to record precisely where those wonderful pictures were taken? Geotagging your pictures is an extremely useful and fun way to retrace your outings and vacations. It allows you to reminisce exactly where those special pictures were taken. It adds another dimension to your photo collections, and adds to the conversation topics by showing your friends exactly where you’ve been. You’ll get even more out of your favorite photo organization software. Don’t want to purchase expensive add-ons for your camera, or purchase a new camera that has a GPS built in? GeoTag It! is your solution. An affordable, fully featured Geotagging application that has more capabilities than those expensive add-ons or expensive new cameras. 1. Works for ALL your cameras 2. Extremely easy to use, turn it on and put the phone in your pocket (or tablet in your bag) 3. Works with or without a data plan 4. Visualize your trips and even share them with your friends 5. Retrace your steps in gorgeous 3D 6. View where your cellphone or tablet pictures were taken on a map 7. Supports industry standard GPX format (compatible with Apple Aperture, Adobe Lightroom, and countless other photo organization tools). Usage Turotial: http://www.javysoft.com/JavySoft/News/Entries/2012/10/24_GeoTag_It%21_Tutorial.html

description: Find your caravan using this stylish and simple to use app. The Find My Caravan app provides compass, radar & Google Maps displays to guide you back to your caravan! To use the app simply press the target button whilst standing next to your caravan - the app will capture your location using GPS coordinates via the phone's GPS sensors. Once the app has captured your location it will store the location coordinates so you can close the app you should wish. Upon wanting to return to your caravan simply launch the app and press the locate button. In locate mode the app will provide several displays which can be selected using the slider in the centre of the screen. You can use either the compass, Google Map or radar display. All are updated in real time. We hope you enjoy using the app and welcome any feedback you may have.

Important: * To use this app you will need access to a computer (only MS Windows is currently supported). * You'll be asked to download a separate utility from a web. This is not a game.

description: You can make wallpapers just fit your Android Phone! You can use your favorite pictures to create wallpaper. How to set wallpaper 1."Wallpaper Maker" MENU, chose "Gallery" > "Wallpaper" 2.Chose image, press MENU chose"Set Wallpaper". How to set Screen size image as wallpaper 1."Wallpaper Maker" MENU, choose "Gallery" > "Image" 2.Choose image, press MENU choose"Set Wallpaper". 3.List of Live Wallpaper, Choose "Walpaer Make" to set Screen size Wallpaper. Menu Press, menu button, or Long press screen. Add Picture Pick the picture, and add to the screen. Item Pick and add items to the screen. Background Pattern Choose bacgkround pattern. (Long Press, Double Tap) Picture Quality Choose save quality of the image. Gallery Check and set wallpapers that you made. Image Menu Long press pictures you add. Copy Copy the image. Image Press menu, you can Set Wallpaper, Share, or delete the image. LINE Home Press menu, you can Share, or delete the image. Questions, bug information please e-mail or to Twitter. mss2011c@gmail.com @mss2011c

description: Decorate your screen with beautiful pictures of some of the greatest sights of the London. Enjoy amazing animated rain with steamy window effect or live water effect that simulates water ripple effect (water drops effect). FEATURES: - Set of photos of London landmarks (Tower Bridge, Big Ben, Buckingham Palace, …) in HD quality + opportunity to set your own photo - Animated live rain - Smoky window (steamy window) effect - Water drops effect - This free London wallpaper fully supports horizontal orientation and looks great on both mobile phones and tablet devices and supports screen switching - This rainy wallpaper app will sleep when your phone is inactive, so this live wallpaper will not drain your battery - Real smooth 3D animations (based on OpenGL ES 2.0, compatible with 99% mobile phone devices) How to set this free wallpaper with views of London on the home screen of your phone: Home → Applications → Settings → Display → Wallpapers → Home screen wallpaper → Live wallpapers → Rainy London Live Wallpaper Check out our account for more free beautiful live wallpapers Notice: this free London wallpaper contains ads This free rainy day in London wallpaper has been tested and looks great on latest devices such as Samsung Galaxy S4, Samsung Galaxy Note 3, Nexus 7, Sony Xperia Z

Which is the most intelligent gender? Help us answer this question by participating in our free Gender Battle! When you start this app, you enter your gender and are then posed questions in 5 levels of difficulty. In the first level, you get one point per correct answer, in the second level two points and so on. Per wrong answer you get one minus point in every level. After each round you can see which gender is in the lead. The men's average score is showed next to the women's average score in a bar chart. A few thousand questions make sure this app won't get boring. Happy quizzing!

The super fan's guide to RuneScape - created by fans, for fans. Wikia apps are always up-to-date with highly accurate, real-time information from Wikia’s vast fan community. The RuneScape Game Guide features hundreds of pages of content created by gamers just like you. Find in-depth articles on armour/armor (melee, ranged, magic), calculators, rare items, dungeons, events, guides, guilds, locations, minigames, gold making guides, leveling up guides, music, quests, skills, tasks, and weapons. No other app offers this amount of accurate insights, tips and game information with useful companion-play features such as: - Browsing: categories and articles created by Wikia’s RuneScape community and rank them in trending order - Search: RuneScape wiki articles - Readability: enjoy a clean text-, image-, and video-browsing experience with font and text layout customization options - Collaboration: Join the community! Score Caster makes distributing game scores to any app or platform easy and fast. By tapping the share button you can export your message or post to any app on your device. Using pre-formatted fields and quick filling features, it's the perfect solution to distribute score stats to friends or fans fast. Fill any fields that apply and send the message anywhere without having to open other apps. Score Caster works with any sport or event. From Basketball, Football, Soccer, or Baseball, to Polo, Cornhole, or Horseshoes- format your message by filling in as many or as little fields as you want. Score Caster provides a simple solution for anything that involves a score count.

description: Everything you get from a traditional test prep book PLUS one-on-one instruction covering all the math on the PRAXIS. YourTeacher – PRAXIS 1 Math Prep Course ****** “It’s like a private math classroom, but you are the only student.” John "I just love YourTeacher and the way you explain things. I felt like I was in a classroom instead of just looking at examples." Diane "I used your program in preparing for the Math PRAXIS. Nailed it thanks to you guys!" Chris "I used your lessons to help me pass the Math PRAXIS 1. I tried personal tutors, books, and studied for months. Finally, I found you and I tried it out. For some reason your lessons were taught in such a format that I could easily understand. I scored a 178! Passing score for Washington State is 176. I am so grateful. I was going to lose my teaching job and the passing math grade was what I needed to become residency certified. I now have my certificate and all is well. Thank you for providing me with great, easy to follow instructions with your program. " Andrea "I am using the program to pass the PRAXIS exam. It is exactly what I have been looking for. I took all kinds of prep stuff..nothing helped. All the other courses were too advanced and did not focus on the fundamentals. This is a wonderful tool. I only wish I had found it months and months ago!" JoEllen "I used YourTeacher to pass math PRAXIS and I ended up doing great. Enjoyed the program and learned more than ever I did in high school." Kristin ****** Need more than practice problems to get ready for the PRAXIS? YourTeacher’s PRAXIS Math Prep Course provides everything you would get in a traditional test prep review book (i.e. written practice problems, reading material, etc.) PLUS the one-on-one instruction you need to truly learn the math covered on the PRAXIS. Our lessons include: -Multiple video example problems (similar to how a teacher starts class at the board by explaining the examples from the textbook) -Interactive practice problems with built-in support (similar to how a teacher assigns practice and walks around the class providing help) -A Challenge Problem (similar to how a teacher assigns a higher level problem which students must work on their own to prove mastery) -Extra problem worksheets (similar to how a teacher assigns additional problems for homework) -Review notes (similar to how a teacher provides summary handouts or refers you to your textbook) ****** PRAXIS Math Prep Course - Scope and Sequence YourTeacher’s PRAXIS Math Prep Course covers the exact math you need to ace to pass the PRAXIS. CHAPTER 1: WHOLE NUMBERS Addition Subtraction Estimating Sums and Differences Addition and Subtraction Word Problems Multiplication Exponents Division Estimating Products and Quotients Multiplication and Division Word Problems Addition Properties Multiplication Properties CHAPTER 2: INTEGERS Addition and Subtraction Multiplication and Division Order of Operations Evaluation CHAPTER 3: FRACTIONS Divisibility Rules Factors and Primes Prime Factorization Multiples and Least Common Multiples Greatest Common Factor Introduction to Fractions Equivalent Fractions (Part I) Lowest Terms Equivalent Fractions (Part II) Improper Fractions and Mixed Numbers Comparing Proper Fractions Comparing Mixed Numbers and Improper Fractions Word Problems Adding and Subtracting Like Fractions Adding and Subtracting Unlike Fractions Adding Mixed Numbers Subtracting Mixed Numbers Multiplying Fractions Multiplying Mixed Numbers Dividing Fractions Dividing Mixed Numbers CHAPTER 4: DECIMALS CHAPTER 5: EXPRESSIONS, EQUATIONS, & INEQUALITIES CHAPTER 6: PATTERNS & FUNCTIONS CHAPTER 7: RATIO, PROPORTION, & PERCENT CHAPTER 8: GEOMETRY CHAPTER 9: MEASUREMENT CHAPTER 10: PROBABILITY & STATISTICS (Wifi or 3G connection required)
release_text: Interface updated to accommodate larger screen resolutions. App updated to run in both portrait and landscape modes. Lesson content has been expanded and includes more video instruction for each lesson. In addition to the video examples each lesson includes interactive practice problems, challenge questions, and worksheets.

description: Progress through the ages of time, beginning from the stone age all the way to the nuclear age in “The Wars”. The idea of the game is simple - destroy your enemy base. Think strategically and tactically decide the balance between both attack and defense to succeed. Remember that you cannot repair your base during battle. As you progress and kill all the enemies you will collect experience points, spend these to move onto the next of 5 available ages. Each age has its own unique units, defense levels and special weapons for when it gets heated! Try the medium and hard levels for more of a challenge to become a War master!
Text, chords and tabs of singers and groups. Easy navigation, friendly design.

Build a mighty kingdom and lead your armies to victory in this multiplayer strategy game of medieval warfare! Build deadly defenses and train mighty armies to conquer your dominion. Go to war with thousands of other real-world players, and fight your way across the world in this epic real time strategy combat game. Epic Features: ★ Choose priority targets for precise control over your army like a true RTS game ★ Build and upgrade a variety of units, defensive towers, and resource production buildings ★ Match strategy and strength against thousands of other players online ★ Engage in ongoing wars with rival kingdoms for huge rewards ★ App best on both tablets and mobile phones ★ Defend your base to win wars ★ Execute your war strategy in real time using rally points ★ Build an army of noble knights, swift archers, and powerful catapults! ★ A totally free to play multiplayer game (no ads either!) ★ Master a variety of strategies from castle design to orchestrating powerful attacks ★ Strategically choose which attributes of your towers to upgrade ★ Level up to earn the ability to fight with Mighty Dragons! description: Il Campionato 2015-2016 inizia alla grande: ora la app Serie A TIM è per tutti. Scopri subito tutte le novità e i contenuti esclusivi sul tuo smartphone e tablet, ora anche in WiFi. Per ciascuna giornata del campionato Serie A TIM 2015-16 sono previsti: • video di ciascuna partita aggiornati in tempo reale con: goal, migliori azioni e highlight disponibili entro pochi minuti dall’evento. Poi sintesi differite, azioni salienti, replay con tutto il meglio del match, statistiche di gioco animate per seguire la partita in modo nuovo e divertente. • approfondimenti con Goal Collection della giornata, Top Goal, Parate e Assist • videosintesi della giornata e presentazione della successiva: classifiche, risultati, formazioni, statistiche aggiornate in tempo reale, Top Player della settimana per seguire da vicino i migliori giocatori del torneo • cronaca live di tutte le partite istante per istante Inoltre: • videonews, conferenze stampa, interviste, calciomercato e calcio internazionale: notizie in video aggiornate in tempo reale • nuovo archivio completo dei video del campionato, per rivivere tutte le partite e rivedere i migliori goal ed azioni in qualsiasi momento • selezione TIM dei video dai canali ufficiali delle squadre nella sezione Dalla Rete • video divertenti nella sezione Non Solo Calcio • PIN per usare il tuo abbonamento Serie A TIM premium su un device alternativo, ad esempio sul tuo tablet o un altro smartphone. Come funziona: ricevi il PIN con SMS appena ti abboni, inserendolo quando ti verrà richiesto all’interno della app abiliti il device alternativo. Se smarrisci il PIN nessun problema: puoi rigenerarlo con la funzione “Genera PIN” che trovi in Impostazioni. Il device principale viene automaticamente riabilitato all’accesso successivo. • la app è compatibile con Google Cast per avere sulla TV news, video e statistiche aggiornate. Discover all the latest news and exclusive content on your smartphone and tablet, now in WiFi. For each day of the championship Serie A 2015-16 are planned: • video of each game to date in real time with: goals, actions and highlight best available within minutes of the event. Then synthesis deferred, highlights, replay with all the best of the match, game statistics animated to follow the game in a new and fun. • insights with Goal Collection of the day, Top Goal, Parades and Assist • video highlights of the day and presentation of the following: standings, results, lineups, statistics updated in real time, Top Player of the week to follow closely the best players of the tournament • record live all matches moment by moment Furthermore: • video news, press conferences, interviews, and international football transfer market: news video in real time updated • New complete archive of videos of the season, to relive the games and review the best goals and actions at any time • TIM selection of videos from the official channels of the teams in the From Network • funny videos in the Not Just Football • PIN when your subscription Serie A TIM premium on an alternative device, for example on your tablet or another smartphone. How it works: you receive your PIN with SMS as soon as you subscribe, you will be asked when placing it inside the app enable the device alternative. The main device is automatically re-enabled the next time. • The app is compatible with Google to have cast on the TV news, videos and updated statistics. To use Chromecasts follow the instructions that appear in the app the first connection on the WiFi network used for Chromecasts (some content may not be available on Chromecasts when rights are not compatible, follow us for the news). Deactivation: the subscription is renewed automatically and can be stopped at any time from the app under Settings. description: A fun new game about American history. Featuring: - Realistic Conestoga wagon physics! - 5 exciting diseases! - The lost city of gold! So much more than just going left!

description: TESTSIEGER!!! Das Android Magazin kürt die Kochmeister Rezepte App zum Testsieger mit der maximalen Bewertung von fünf ★★★★★ Sternen ! ✔✔✔ NEU: Universal-App - Anzeige sowohl für Handys als auch Tablets optimiert. ✔✔✔ „Die App der Kochmeister Community besticht mit einer Auswahl von unglaublichen 60.000 Rezepten. Frei nach dem Motto: Wer da nicht satt wird, ist selber schuld. Dank der übersichtlichen Suche behält man zu jeder Zeit den Überblick. Schlaues Detail: Wer in der Suchmaske „veggy“ oder „Diät“ anwählt, erhält nur Rezepte, die diesen individuellen Wünschen entsprechen. Zusätzlich zur Rezeptsuche gibt es ein „Rezept des Tages“ und regelmäßige, saisonale Specials, beispielsweise Spargel-Gerichte im Frühjahr oder kulinarische Ideen für das Weihnachtsfest. Die App überzeugt durch eine schön gestaltete Oberfläche und die riesengroße Auswahl an Rezepten. Die aktiven Mitglieder der Community sorgen für den persönlichen Touch: sie bewerten, kommentieren und stellen eigene Rezepte zur Verfügung.“ (Auszug aus dem Android Magazin Ausgabe Juli/August 2012) Mit über 60.000 Rezepten aus der ganzen Welt ist Kochmeister eine der größten Online-Rezeptsammlungen. Die Plattform von Hobbyköchen für Hobbyköche! Hierbei handelt es sich nicht um ein erneutes "Hochglanzkochbuch" sondern um eine lebendige Rezeptsammlung aus vielen Quellen. Die aktive Community garantiert immer neue Rezepte, Kommentare und Fotos, Tag für Tag. Das Besondere: Hier kann man sich hervorragend inspirieren lassen durch spielerische Auswahl nach Landesküchen und Speisearten über die innovative iPhone Steuerung. Die Rezeptsammlung ist wird ständig kreativ erweitert von derzeit über 38.000 aktiven und registrierten Hobbyköchen. Lassen Sie sich von deren gesammelten Know-How und Kochkunst inspirieren! Sie suchen ein ganz bestimmtes Rezept oder einfach Inspiration zum Kochen? Sie möchten etwas Saisonales kochen oder einfach durch die Fülle der Rezepte schlendern? Eine Inspirationsquelle sowohl für alltägliche als auch besondere Gerichte! FEATURES : ✔ 60.000 von einer der grössten deutschen Koch-Communities geschriebene und kommentierte Rezepte ✔ ständig wechselde und erweiterbare Rezepte ✔ Innovative Auswahl nach Ländern und Art des Gerichts ✔ Special-Funktion: saisonale Specials für Jahreszeiten, Feste und Events ✔ Kommentare und Rezepttests von anderen Usern lesen ✔ Favoriten-Funktion macht Rezepte auch offline verfügbar ✔ Lieblingsrezepte in Favoriten einfach speichern und verwalten ✔ Praktische und hilfreiche Einkaufsliste Zur Information: die App benötigt Internetzugriff, da die Rezepte aufgrund der großen Menge und der ständigen Erweiterungen online in einer Datenbank gespeichert sind. TEST WINNER! The Android Magazine selects the master chef recipes app as the winner with the maximum rating of five ★ ★ ★ ★ ★ Stars! ✔ ✔ ✔ NEW: Universal App - Display both mobile phones and tablet optimized. ✔ ✔ ✔ "The app of Kochmeister community offers a selection of incredible 60,000 recipes. True to the motto: Who is not satisfied there, is your own fault. Thanks to the clear search you at all times retain the overview. Sly detail: Who in the search "veggy" or "diet" dials, receives only recipes that meet these individual needs. In addition to the search for a recipe there is a "recipe of the day" and regular, seasonal specials, such as asparagus dishes in the spring or culinary ideas for Christmas. The app benefits from a nicely designed interface and the overwhelming choice of recipes. The active members of the community provide the personal touch: they rate, comment and make own recipes available. "(excerpt from the Android Magazine July / August 2012) With over 60,000 recipes from around the world Cooking Master is one of the largest online collection of recipes. The platform of amateur cooks for home cooks! This is not about a renewed "glossy cookbook" but a vibrant collection of recipes from many sources. The active community always guaranteed new recipes, comments, and photos every day. The special feature: Here you can be inspired by excellent playful Select by country kitchens and dining styles of the innovative iPhone controls. The recipe collection is constantly expanding creative of currently more than 38,000 active registered and hobby chefs. Let yourself be inspired by their accumulated know-how and good food! You are looking for a very specific recipe or just inspiration for cooking? You want to cook something Seasons or simply stroll through the abundance of recipes? A source of inspiration for both everyday and special dishes! FEATURES: ✔ 60,000 from one of the largest German cooking communities written and commented Recipes ✔ constantly wechselde and extensible recipes ✔ Innovative Select by country and type of court ✔ Special feature: seasonal specials for seasons, festivals and events ✔ Read comments and recipe testing from other users ✔ Favorites function makes recipes available offline ✔ Just save and manage favorite recipes in Favourites ✔ Practical and useful shopping list For your information, the app needs internet access because the recipes due to the large amount and the continuous extensions are stored online in a database.

Your blood pressure is rising with each gear changing and heart beats faster whenever you see the latest sports car passing by. One is for sure, you should start with free staff first like some good “car wallpaper HD” for your mobile phone. There is nothing better than to get stuff that is of high quality and get it for free. The beautiful Mustang Shelby picture will leave you out of breath and make you love this type of a car even more. You will even wish to have only mustang live wallpapers on your phone because it looks so powerful and amazing. Maybe you will want just a “car background” images of a part of a supercar you like the most, the wheel or the exhaust pipe or the car door that open upwards like on some Mercedes models. Download for free “Car Live Wallpaper”, make your Samsung Galaxy phone and tablet awesome and let the free ride begin! *Android™ is a trademark of Google Inc. *This app is not affiliated with or endorsed by Samsung.

description: Отборные русские анекдоты в одном маленьком приложении! Здесь собраны триста самых смешных и свежих анекдотов для тех, кто умеет и любит смеяться! Приложение имеет красивую оболочку и оптимизированную для смартфонов и планшетов навигацию. Теперь Вы всегда сможете проявить хорошее чувство юмора в компании друзей или знакомых, рассказав классный новый анекдот! Selected Russian jokes in one small application! Here are collected the three funniest jokes and fresh for those who knows and loves to laugh! The application has a nice shell and optimized for smartphones and tablets navigation. Now you will be able to show a good sense of humor in the company of friends or acquaintances, telling anecdote cool new!

Greek Trivia Quiz 2012 Είναι γνωστό ότι όλοι οι Έλληνες λατρεύουμε τα παιχνίδια ερωτήσεων. Η εφαρμογή αυτή λοιπόν έχει ως σκοπό να σας δώσει την ευκαιρία να αποδείξετε πόσο καλά ενημερωμένοι είστε για το τι γίνεται γύρω σας καθώς και να έρθετε αντιμέτωποι με τους υπόλοιπους παίχτες μιας και διαθέτει online πίνακα σκορ!! Μπορείτε επίσης να στείλετε τις δικές σας ερωτήσεις οι οποίες θα προστεθούν σε επόμενες ενημερώσεις. Drymvizion@gmail.com για οποιαδήποτε παρατήρηση η πρόταση. Εάν εντοπίσετε λάθος ερώτηση παρακαλούμε να μας στείλετε email στο drymvizion@gmail.com να την διορθώσουμε.

Hotspot Finder will help you find the nearest free wifi access point. Covered area: Czech republic, Germany, France, New Zealand Main features: * List of nearest wifi hotspots depending on current location * Ability to display a map of surrounding area * Works in offline mode, database is downloaded into device * You can add your own hotspots and share them with other users

******************************** 리브로피아는 도서관 자료관리시스템과 직접 연동하여 서비스를 제공하고 있습니다. 도서 검색, 도서 예약, 대출 현황, 전자책 등 일부 서비스는 해당 도서관 사정에 의해 장애가 발생할 수 있습니다. 이러한 경우 리브로피아 내의 Q&A에 글을 남겨 주시면 신속하게 조치 하도록 하겠습니다. ******************************** 신간포함 1만여 종(책)의 국내 최대 무료 전자책 대출 서비스를 제공 (타 도서관 앱들과 비교 불가)!!! 전국의 모든 공공 및 대학 도서관들의 정보(책정보, 좌석정보 등)를 스마트폰으로 이용해 보세요!!! 1. 도서관의 전자책을 무료로 편하게 빌려서 보세요 !!! 2. 도서관에 가기전 열람실 자리 확인 하고 가세요 !!! 3. 모바일 회원증으로 편리하게 대출/반납 하세요 !!! 4. 도서관 소장도서의 대출여부를 확인하고 예약하세요 !!! 5. 빌린도서 연체 하지 마시고 반납연기 하세요 !!! 6. 관심있는 도서를 내서재 책장에 관리 하세요 !!! 7. 내주위에 도서관이 어디에 있는지 찾아보세요 !!! 그외 도서관 공지사항, 행사안내, 자유게시판, 영화상영정보, 식단정보, 찾아오시는길, 대출현황, 대출이력, 신간도서, 대출베스트 ... 등 다양한 도서관 서비스가 제공되고 있습니다. [ 주요 서비스 ] 1. 실시간 열람실 좌석정보 ( 전국공공도서관 109개관, 전국대학도서관 103개관 제공중 ) 2. 도서관 소장도서 검색 ( 전국공공도서관 79개관 제공중 ) 3. 도서 예약, 반납연기, 대출현황, 대출이력, 예약현황 기능 제공 4. 희망도서 신청 5. 관심도서추가 ( 대출하고 싶은 도서를 별도 보관 관리 청구기호 및 대출가능여부를 확인 가능 cf : "개인컨텐츠>내도서" 에서 확인 가능함 ) 6. 도서 바코드 스캔 검색 ( 도서관 소장 도서인지 확인 ) 7. 도서관 위치기반 지도 검색 8. 도서관 증강현실 검색 9. 모바일 회원증 ( 도서 대출,반납 가능. 플라스틱 회원증과 동일 ) 10. 무료 e-book 전자책 보기( 32개 도서관 무료 전자책 제공중 ) 11. 매일 갱신되는 신간도서 목록 보기 **************************************************** [실시간 열람실 좌석 정보 추가 문의] 이용하시는 도서관 홈페이지에서 열람실좌석을 제공하는 도서관을 추가 요청 하시면 신속하게 추가 하도록 하겠습니다. ( 업데이트 없이 추가가능 ) **************************************************** [ 리브로피아와 협약한 도서관 현황 : 277개관 - 2014년01월15일 현재 ] 서울 43, 경기 64, 인천 14, 충남 52, 충북 6, 대구 2, 경북 5, 부산 14, 울산 5, 경남 47, 광주 1, 전남 14, 전북 9, 제주 1 개관 이용하시는 도서관이 협약되어 있는지 지금바로 확인해 보세요 [ 협약도서관이란 ? ] 도서관 자료관리시스템과 직접 연동하여 도서예약, 반납연기, 모바일회원증을 이용한 대출/반납, 대출현황, 대출이력, 예약현황, 반납예정일 알림 메세지..등을 리브로피아를 이용하여 언제 어디서나 이용 가능 합니다. 단, 도서관 관외대출회원으로 가입되어 있어야 합니다. ************ 협약도서관은 앞으로도 계속 추가 됩니다. ************ [전체기능 리스트] --------------------------------------------------------- 1. 도서관 --------------------------------------------------------- 1.1 도서관 관리 1.2 소장도서검색 1.3 바코드스캔검색 ( 소장도서관의 도서 확인 ) 1.4 주변도서관검색 ( 증강현실을 이용한 도서관 검색 ) 1.5 도서관정보 1.6 대출현황 1.7 대출이력 1.8 예약현황 1.9 모바일회원증 ( 플라스틱 회원증 대체 ) 1.10 도서관전자책 ( 공공도서관 계속 추가중 ) 1.11 신착자료안내 1.12 대출베스트 1.13 열람실좌석확인 ( 공공/대학 도서관 계속 추가중 ) 1.14 공지사항 1.15 상호대차 --------------------------------------------------- 2. 새로나온책 --------------------------------------------------- 2.1 신간베스트안내 2.2 카테고리별 신간도서 검색 2.3 날짜별 신간도서 검색 2.4 신간도서 검색 ------------------------------------------------ 3. 개인컨텐츠 ------------------------------------------------ 3.1 개인도서검색 3.2 내도서 ( 대출하고 싶은 도서를 별도 보관 관리 청구기호 및 대출가능여부를 확인 가능 ) 3.3 웹검색 3.4 바코드스캔검색 ( 모든 책에 대한 바코드 스캔 검색 확인 가능 ) 3.5 e-Book 서비스 --------------------------------------------------- 4. 환경설정 --------------------------------------------------- 4.1 관리자기능 4.2 In/Out모드 4.3 Push 서비스 4.4 이용안내 4.5 공지사항 4.6 Q/A보기 ******************************** Peer data management system and the ribs are directly linked to the library service. description: Enjoy this beautiful lock screen for your Android device. Key Features: * More than 10 awesome backgrounds to pick * 24 hour clock setting * Enable/disable battery status * Enable/disable fireflies on the night screen * Enable passcode lock or just use as slider screen lock * Phone wallpaper can be used as background theme for lock Have fun with this awesome screen lock and if you like it, please give us good rating.

Make your friends jealous! Give to your phone an unique look easily! A full set of widgets, wich include clock, date, agenda, battery, shortcuts... everything you need on your homescreen, with elegance. Customizable colors (battery bar and texts). Install application. Open the app. Install the skin. Create a new UCCW widget. Search ProSlide widgets on your skins list. Enjoy! 23 skins, you can choose the shortcuts you use the most!! News and weather widgets are a background for the widget of your choice. Grid on screenshots is 4X10. If you have a problem with the skin email me at: pippoto.androiddesign@gmail.com If you don't have a SD card, widgets won't show up in list. Email me for fix. ✭✭ Pippoto Top 10 themers on mycolorscreen ✭✭

This is a free 3D room escape game. This is part 2 of 3, so check out part 1 if you haven’t already. The goal is to escape captivity by discovering clues, solving puzzles, and finding and using objects in the room. This is a fun, light-to-moderately challenging game for new or experienced room escape game players alike. If you get stuck, a step-by-step walk through (with hints) will push you in the correct direction. There are multiple endings, some bad, others good. But don’t worry; the game will auto-save your every move so you can always undo a step. Make sure to download the third and final part of this room escape trilogy when you are done! Please do not spoil the fun for others by posting puzzle solutions in the comments.

So, you really like Canada Weather & Radar, but you happen to be on the water. It sounds like you need a new app! Hence: Canada Marine. Using the same format that has generated hundreds of 5-star ratings for Canada Weather, Canada Marine takes Environment Canada’s excellent collection of marine forecasts and data and puts them in an easy-to-read format. Browse marine zones by map, use your GPS location to find marine zones near you, link directly to Environment Canada radar, maps, and other resources, and more. From a developer you know using forecasts you trust, look no further than Canada Marine. As far as I can tell, it's the only Canadian Marine forecast app on the market.
release_text: As this is the first version, bear with me a little bit and report your bugs to apps@fishandwhistle.net . Enjoy!

description: AE 오토잉글리쉬, 랭컴 듣고 싶은 것만 듣기, 내 맘대로 듣기, 어디서나 듣기, 모르는 것만 듣기, Matching 학습으로 재미있게 학습내용 확인하기, 검색하여 듣기 ☞ 모든 표현에 원어민 음성이 지원 ☞ 일상 생활에서 필요한 영어표현 ☞ 즉석에서 대처할 수 있는 유용한 영어표현 ☞ 인사표현, 사교표현, 일상표현을 장면별로 구성 ☆ 검색하여 학습하기 ~ 검색기능을 이용하여 원하는 표현을 검색하여 학습하기. ☆ 원어민 발음으로 Listening, Matching 학습하기. ☆ 듣고 싶은 것만 듣기 ~ 지능적 콘텐츠 분류에 따라 표현, 표현해석의 원하는 부분만을 자신에 맞는 원하는 순서로 학습하기. ☆ 내 맘대로 듣기 ~ 반복횟수, 반복속도를 조절하여 나만의 스타일로 학습하기. ☆ 어디서나 듣기 ~ Web과 스마트폰을 이용하여 언제 어디서나 학습하기. ☆ 모르는 것만 듣기 ~ 학습하면서 아는 표현을 체크하여 전체 표현 또는 모르는 표현만을 반복적으로 학습하기. ☆ 학습내용 확인하기 ~ Matching 학습을 통하여 학습내용 확인하기. ★ 학습강좌의 구성 Part 1 인사표현 Unit 01 ~ Unit 08 Part 2 사교표현 Unit 09 ~ Unit 13 Part 3 일상표현 Unit 14 ~ Unit 25 ★★★ 오토잉글리쉬 AE 회화 어플 시리즈 ★★★ AE 여행 독일어회화 AE 여행 스페인어회화 AE 여행 영어회화 AE 여행 일본어회화 AE 여행 중국어회화 AE 여행 프랑스어회화 AE 일상 영어회화 AE 일상 일본어회화 AE 일상 중국어회화 AE 해외출장 영어회화 AE 해외출장 일본어회화 AE 해외출장 중국어회화 AE 쌩기초 영어회화 AE 쌩기초 일본어회화 AE 쌩기초 중국어회화 AE 즉통 중국어회화 사전 AE 즉통 영어회화 사전 AE 즉통 일본어회화 사전 ---- 개발자 연락처 : 오토잉글리쉬(주) 서울시 구로구 구로3동 EnC 벤처 드림타워 2차 802호 오류 사항 및 문의 사항 : Tel : 02-6330-8773 e-mail : autoenglish@autoenglish.co.kr AE Auto-English, raengkeom Hear what you want to hear, to hear the way I want to hear, anywhere, all I hear, Matching learning fun, learning and listening ☞ All express native voice support English expressions needed in everyday life ☞ Useful English expressions that can cope with on-the-fly ☞ ☞ Personnel representations, social representations configuration, day-to-day representation of the scene ☆ by searching, learning by learning to use the search function to search for the desired expression. 本アプリでは、人気の金魚100品種を紹介。 そのほかにも、日常の水槽管理から、病気予防や治療などもわかりやすく解説いたします。 また、金魚に関する『用語集』や金魚の写真を鑑賞できる『フォトギャラリー』も搭載。 フォトギャラリーでは、鮮やかな金魚が泳いでいる写真はもちろん、コイのように金魚を真上から撮影した写真も掲載しているため、めずらしい金魚の姿を多数鑑賞していただけます。 金魚を飼っている方はもちろん、金魚を飼いたいけど品種で迷っている方にも、お気に入りの品種の発見や飼育のきっかけをつかんでいただける内容となっております。 ■収録コンテンツ ◆100品種の金魚の紹介 　写真＋解説で人気の金魚を紹介。 　色や体型についての解説のほか、金魚の歴史なども掲載。 ◆金魚の飼い方 「基礎知識」 ： 体型や色、ひれなどの種類から、観賞の楽しみ方についてまでを解説。 「水槽のレイアウト・セッティング」 ： 和のイメージ、メルヘンな世界など、イメージごとの水槽のレイアウト方法を解説。 ◆金魚の管理・ケア方法 管理方法から、繁殖・成長についての解説はもちろん、病気・治療についても詳しく解説。 ◆用語集 50音順で金魚に関する用語を解説。 ■機能 ◆充実の「検索機能」で金魚を探す 名前からの検索だけでなく、収録している100品種のデータを以下の方法で検索可能。 　・金魚一覧（50音順） 　・キーワード検索 　・フォトギャラリーで探す ◆気になる金魚は「お気に入り機能」で再チェック 　気になる金魚をチェックすると、「お気に入り」ページから一目で再閲覧可能。 ◆「フォトギャラリー」で全種の写真を楽しむ 　全種の写真が閲覧可能なスライドビューアー機能を搭載。 　スライドの時間間隔やシャッフル再生、お気に入りの写真のみの閲覧などが可能。 【収録魚種】(一部抜粋) フナ（鮒） ヒブナ（緋鮒） テツギョ（鉄魚） アルビノテツギョ ワキン（和金） 素赤ワキン（四ッ尾） 更紗ワキン キャリコワキン 更紗ワキン（三ッ尾） 更紗ワキン（四ッ尾） 桜ワキン 白ワキン ワキン（ハーフ銀鱗） 武蔵ワキン（透明鱗） 更紗コメット 白コメット 桜コメット 桜コメットショートテール シュブンキン（朱分金） 珍色シュブンキン 昭和三色 珍色シュブンキン バルーン 珍色シュブンキン 緋写 藍シュブンキン 平成三色シュブンキン ブリストルシュブンキン ジキン（地金） サンシュウキン（三州錦） オーロラ透明鱗 羽衣オーロラ オーロラ・イエローグリーン ミューズ 彩錦 更紗リュウキン キャリコリュウキン 藍キャリコリュウキン アルビノリュウキン 白リュウキン 素赤リュウキン 玉サバ フクブクロ（玉サバ透明鱗） 白玉サバ 更紗リュウキンショートテール トサキン（土佐錦） チャキン（茶金） チャキンロング パールスケール 高頭パール ピンポンパール 【掲載媒体】 AppBank様に掲載いただきました。。（9/22掲載） http://www.appbank.net/2012/09/22/iphone-application/474609.php ★掲載コメント★ --------------------------------------- 飼い方・用語など金魚に詳しくなれる図鑑。 --------------------------------------- In this application, it introduces the 100 varieties of goldfish popular. description: Sharingan Eye Live Wallpaper for Android 2.1+ Hypnotize your friends with a cool animated live wallpaper inspired to famous anime 4 type of sharingan eves available : 1)Sasuke Uchiha Sharingan 2)Sasuke Uchiha Mangekyō Sharingan 3)Itachi Uchiha Mangekyō Sharingan 4)Kakashi Sharingan Use the Mangekyō button to improve sharingan type! Red Madara and blue Paine version available, you can personalize the background color , the rotating speed , accelerate with your finger and much more! Installation 1)After download , press a free space with your finger of your homescreen until a menu will appear 2)elect Wallpaper Select Live Wallpaper 3)Select Sharingan Live Wallapaper 4)Press "Use This" or "Setting" button for set your preferences.

NO ads, NO push notifications NO spyware, NO malware NO permissions required FREE BONUS 22 backgrounds: broken screen, squashed mosquitoes, ants, binoculars, blood stains,cracked glass 2, cracked glass 3, bullet holes, ripped metal, squashed flies,broken screen 2, scorched metal, squashed mosquito, rusted metal, broken security, nuclear waste, periscope, broken screen, scorched metal, keyhole and jagged metal. Elementary, what your device is made of is a millions and billions of molecules – and each one of them is made of atoms. Well, for all of you chemistry or physics lovers out there – here’s the perfect background for your phone – the Atom live wallpaper! It features a molecule created of black and red atoms, with red electrons circling all the way around it, jumping and moving as you’re browsing through your phone! After the download you don't need internet connection to enjoy the application. This application will not download videos from the internet and waste your bandwidth. Download once and enjoy for ever. How to install: Once you have downloaded this live wallpaper the icon will not appear in your homescreen. To activate the application and access the settings, tap on the "Menu" button, select "Wallpapers", then select "Live Wallpapers". Scroll down to the live wallpaper icon and press "select wallpaper" to activate the application.

Viaja alrededor del mundo de las palabras con este divertido y educacional app de geografia. Geografia mundial te desafia a traves de tus conocimientos en geografia con una serie de preguntas e imagines de satelite de 197 paises! Se te presentaran 5 paises al azar y examenes en un fomato de multiples categorias sobre paises, capitales, moneda, lenguage y poblacion. Mira como el globo del mundo rota hasta que encuentra una gerion para examinarte, acercandose cerca y alegandose a traves de areas diferentes. Se te daran puntos por cada respuesta y estate atento porque apareceran perguntas de bono al igual que preguntas generales de geografia. Usa tu pantalla para seleccionar las respuestas durante el juego, cuanto mas rapido contestes y hagas tus selecciones mas puntos conseguiras. Contenido: *Zoom cerca y lejos de un globo del mundo rotatorio. *Aprende de una manera divertida sobre paises, capitales de ciudades, moneda, lenguage y poblacion! *Examina tu saber sobre 197 paises diferentes! *Obtiene puntos por cada respuesta basica y estate atento a las preguntas bono asi como a las preguntas de geografia general. Mira el mundo con Geografia Mundial! Travel around the world of words with this fun and educational app for geography. World Geography challenges you through your knowledge in geography with a series of questions and images from satellite to 197 countries! You will be randomly presented 5 countries and tests on a fomato by multiple categories of countries, capital, currency, language and population. Watch as the globe rotates until it finds a Gerion to examine you, approaching closer and being alleged through different areas. It will give you points for each answer and pay attention because Perguntas bonus will appear as general questions of geography. Use your screen to select the answers during the game, the faster you answer and make your selections more points. Content: * Zooming in and out of a revolving globe. * Learn the fun way on countries, capital city, currency, language and population! * Examine your know about 197 different countries! * Score points for each answer forewarned basic and bonus questions as well as questions of general geography. See the world with World Geography!

Play this dress-up game featuring three real fashion victims! It's summer again. Time to have a great Pajama Party.The days are warm and in the evening it's nice to go outside for a while, to have a stroll with your friends, wearing your most beautiful pajama. In this game you can choose the nicest look for these three friends. First a great hairstyle and make-up, and then some pajama’s, shoes, blouses and trousers in plenty. Will you make it a nice combination? Make these three friends look scrumptious!

Slippy Snake is the ultimate remake of Snake! Play snake like never before, move in any direction, unlock new levels, and share screenshots with friends! Unlock new challenging, addictive levels and intriguing new power ups, Slippy Snake will be sure to keep you entertained for hours trying to achieve the perfect score. Controlled by touch and with all new HD graphics, Slippy Snake is the best remake that brings the classic game play of the old Nokia game, Snake, back to life! With other eight different types of food, eat apples, burgers and more that make you snake longer, just like the original Snake. Slippy Snake will be sure to keep you on your feet! Enjoy competing against friends to see who can get the highest score on the in-game leader boards. So what are you waiting for? Download Slippy Snake today & start reliving those long productive hours you spent playing Snake on the Nokia! For game play footage and an awesome tutorial feel free to watch the video!

description: Android users are able to easily, quickly see images, pictures, photos, and scanned copy in compressed file / ZIP file. Beautiful betta fish live wallpaper! The Siamese fighting fish also known as Betta, is a popular species of freshwater aquarium fish. This live wallpaper consists of 8 different betta fish. The betta fishes are animated in a 3D hexahedron with some cool effect that you can customize. Multiple background effect of water bubble and shinning dot. There are a lots of options for you to make changes to the live wallpaper. List of features:- * Double tap screen to toggle animation style * Tap screen once to change view depth * 8 different fish * Change lighting color * Dynamic lighting color * Moving light * Use own image as theme * Set rotation speed * Set loop circle speed * Framing option * Multiple background particle effect * Support phone and tablet * Support portrait and landscape mode With nearly 20 different setting options, we are sure you can customize this live wallpaper to something that you really love! If you love betta fish, do try this betta fish live wallpaper!

description: Calculate you Australian income tax from your annual salary! A nice and easy way to calculate what you will be paying from your wage in Australian dollars. Includes Medical levy, Low Income Tax Offset and is updated with 2012-2013 tax rates. A simple slider lets you just slide the salary instead of having to enter the value by pressing the digit buttons. Instantly calculates the 'after tax' wages as you slide! Brought to you by South Pacific Apps - a company specializing on Mobile apps development, Facebook/Twitter apps/games and custom web and installable software. Paye calculation made easy! Income tax calculation for: Australian Capital Territory New South Wales Northern Territory Queensland South Australia Tasmania Victoria Western Australia

Make a tasty burger with crispy fries and refreshing drink. Eat it and then play with toys or take a challenge with a food delivery mini game. Choose from a huge selection of ingredients and create your favorite burger. Bake it, decorate it, and serve it on a colourful tray. If you want to add crispy fries as a side dish, you must first peel and slice the potatoes. After a few moments in the fryer, french fries are ready to be served. Now the only thing you need to make this meal complete is a cool, fresh, and juicy drink. At the end, you can also add some toys to play with while eating your tasty snack. After cooking a tasty meal, you can also take up the challenge of a food delivery mini game or play a slide puzzle mini game. In addition, you can take a snapshot of your masterpiece to show it to your friends. Features: • beautiful, high quality HD graphics • intuitive, easy to use interface • infinite gameplay with unlimited combinations • huge selection of ingredients such as meat, vegetables, spices, sauces, and even toys • four types of drinks with many decorations • screenshots can be saved in your photo gallery to show them to your friends • slide puzzle mini game • food delivery mini game

A nearly complete emulator of HP 12c Platinum financial calculator that actually works! You can try demo version before buying. This application emulates one of the best financial calculators - the famous 12c Platinum from HP. We did not aim to completely emulate the visual appearance of real calculator. Instead, we are focused on precise emulation of the calculator functions The main differences from real calculator: - ON button does not actually turn the calculator on or off, but instead it changes digits separator from dot to comma and vice versa - when a program is running, the display shows actual calculations performed, not just "running" - there is no trade-off between program memory and storage registers - the state of financial registers and RPN stack is displayed on the screen - in ALG mode, the display shows if there are incomplete calculations, and number of open brackets
release_text: Version 1.6 Improved equation solver Version 1.5 Fixed interest rate calculation Version 1.4 Fixed incorrect behavior of CLX button

description: Drive On is a simple and easy racing game for everyone. You are driving a car and need to avoid crashing or touching the trucks blocking the road. What you need to do is go through the trucks and get as many points as you can. Enjoy this game and recommend it to your friends too. Don't crash your car. FEATURES: - Free and Simple - Everyone can play - Global online leaderboard - Social Features - compare and share your high scores with friends How to play: - Touch the screen and drag your finger to the left or right to move the car.

Your ultimate counting teacher!!! Watch your kids as they play & quickly learn how to count and recognize numbers in this fun and simple children’s game. Your children will learn to count their numbers before you can count to 10!!! Completely FREE & packed with 4 different mini-games your kids are sure to enjoy: Fish Tap challenge, Spot the Differences, Jumping Grasshopper and a Dresses Fashion Show. Enjoy remarkable animation technology which introduces a first look at numbers for the whole family to enjoy and learn. description: Users with a FitBit tracker and a Food Plan for weight loss will gain useful analytics to keep them on their path to slimdom. Additionally, FitBitters with an Aria Scale can track how their logging compares to their actual weight loss, and also how they fare in respect to their overall goal at any given moment. No Aria scale? As long as weight is logged on a reliable scale, FitViz calculations will still be equally valuable. The app displays goal details, a current count of calories burned from activity, and the user’s present calorie deficit.

description: Regex Tester is an app that lets you test your regular expressions. You can create new regular expressions and save them for later use. Buy Micromedex® Pediatrics Essentials today for only $9.99 USD per year. You will be prompted to purchase the app after your initial download. If your institution already subscribes to Micromedex Pediatrics™ then this app is FREE. Pediatrics Essentials is a reliable resource for on-the-go access to evidence-based drug information to efficiently and safely manage drug therapy for pediatric patients. It allows clinicians to make accurate and more informed treatment decisions at the point of care, while minimizing errors in this vulnerable patient population. This pediatric-specific app has clinical value for doctors, nurses, and pharmacists. An internet connection is not required, allowing you to make decisions with confidence at anytime, from anywhere. Truven Health Analytics is a trusted source for pediatric drug dosing, based on the strict editorial policies and practices that have guided Micromedex for more than 30 years. Evidence-based, fully referenced pediatric-specific drug information enables clinicians to make informed treatment decisions. The drug monographs cover information including: dose, administration, uses, contraindications/precautions, adverse effects, monitoring, pharmacology, special considerations/preparation, solution- and drug-drug compatibility/incompatibility information, and references. This mobile app also includes a comprehensive enteral formulas component providing nutritional information for approximately 100 different infant formulas and human milk fortifiers, and pediatric prescription enteral formulas. Pediatrics Essentials drug information is intended for full-term babies 29 days of age and older (postnatal age) and preterm babies over 44 weeks postmenstrual age, up to 18 years of age. Do you work at a facility that subscribes to Pediatrics Online or Premier? Check with your Chief of Pediatrics, Director of Pediatrics, Director of the PICU, Directory of Pharmacy, Chief Medical Officer, Chief Nursing Officer, Medical Librarian, or anyone else at your facility responsible for clinical reference information. If you work at a facility that subscribes to Pediatrics Online or Premier, FREE access to these apps requires a password. To obtain the Pediatrics password email support at mdx.smartappsupport@truvenhealth.com from an official work email address (Gmail, yahoo, hotmail, etc. will not be accepted).

description: La guerre du Vietnam oppose dans un premier temps le Nord- Vietnam, communiste, au Sud-Vietnam, nationaliste. Ce dernier, miné par la corruption et le népotisme, est sur le point de s’effondrer. Il est alors soutenu par les Etats-Unis, qui envoient argent, matériel et hommes. Dans le contexte de la guerre froide, l’Armée US est inspirée par la ‘théorie des dominos’, c’est-à-dire que si l’un des pays du Sud- Est asiatique tombe aux mains des communistes, les autres suivront, aussi sûrement que tombent des dominos. Ils interviennent donc militairement, avec la même motivation que pour la Corée du Sud, quinze années plus tôt. Le 19 Octobre 1965, deux Régiments de l'Armée régulière NVA (North-Vietnamese Army) attaquent le camp allié de Plei Mê. Le but de la manoeuvre ennemie est de couper le Vietnam du Sud en deux, en reliant la frontière cambodgienne à la côte. Le camp de Plei Mê, dans la région des Hauts Plateaux, est occupé par douze hommes des forces spéciales américaines ainsi que 350 Montagnards (une des quatre ethnies du Sud-Vietnam, avec les Khmer, les Cham et les Vietnamiens). Le siège du camp dure plusieurs jours. Il est mené par le 33ème Régiment NVA. Venant de Pleiku, à quarante kilomètres au Nord, une colonne Sud-vietnamienne arrive en renfort. Elle tombe elle-même dans une embuscade tendue par le 32ème Régiment NVA. L'artillerie de la ‘First Cav’, débarquée par hélicoptères sur une zone d'atterrissage spéciale (LZ Field Goal), permet de dégager la colonne de renfort Sud-vietnamienne, et plus tard de rompre le siège. « L'Air Cav » contre-attaque. La 1ère Brigade est envoyée sur place et est chargée de débusquer et faire reculer l’ennemi. Votre Brigade (la 3ème) prend la relève début Novembre. Pour débusquer l'ennemi, l'état major décide de lancer une reconnaissance en profondeur et en force (Recherche et Destruction). La bataille de Ia Drang commence le 14 Novembre ... Ce grand affrontement ne vous laissera que peu de choix en définitive : mourir au combat, devenir un héros, survivre au prix de toute gloire ou finir prisonnier … Dans tous les cas, ce seront vos actions qui décideront de votre sort. The Vietnam War at first opposed the North Vietnam Communist South Vietnam, nationalist. The latter, undermined by corruption and nepotism, is on the verge of collapse. It is then supported by the United States who send money, material and men. In the context of the Cold War, the U.S. Army is inspired by the 'domino theory', that is to say, if one of the countries of Southeast Asia fell to the communists, the others will follow as surely as falling dominoes. They intervene militarily, with the same motivation as South Korea, fifteen years earlier. On 19 October 1965, two regiments of the Regular Army NVA (North Vietnamese Army-) attack the Allied camp Plei Me. The purpose of the enemy maneuver is to cut South Vietnam in two, between the Cambodian border to the coast. Camp Plei Me in the Central Highlands, is occupied by twelve men of the U.S. and 350 Montagnards (one of four ethnic groups in South Vietnam, with the Khmer, Cham and Vietnamese) special forces. The siege of the camp lasts for several days. It is led by the 33th NVA Regiment. From Pleiku, forty miles north, a South Vietnamese column reinforcement arrives. The tomb itself in an ambush by the NVA 32nd Regiment. The artillery of the 'First Cav', landed by helicopter on a special landing zone (LZ Field Goal) allows to identify the column reinforcement South Vietnamese, and later break the siege. "The Air Cav" against attack. The 1st Brigade was sent on and is responsible for flushing and reduce the enemy. Your Brigade (3rd) takes over early November. To flush out the enemy, the general staff decided to launch a reconnaissance in depth and force (Search and Destroy). The Battle of Ia Drang begins on November 14 ... This great battle will leave you little choice in the end: to die in battle, become a hero, survive at the price of glory or finish prisoner ... In any case, this will be your actions will determine your fate.

Discover 700+ amazing ideas to capture all the things you want 2do, experience and achieve throughout your life. Year 2015 gives you fresh 365 days to play with – enrich and energise your life! Check out some smart tips, travel advices, interesting facts ◆ DREAM. Capture your goals, awesome dreams, extreme adventures to go & no-miss opportunities to try and 2do. Enrich and energise your life! ◆ PLAN. Stay organised and aspire to reach your goals with 2do planning, and progress tracking. Prioritise goals, set deadlines, apply various filters and sort features. Set routine and long-term reminders to stay focused. Vision board is a powerful visualisation tool that uses the law of attraction to aspire and realise your goals ◆ CREATE a MAP of places to see, things 2do and places you’ve visited already ◆ STAY MOTIVATED and energised with a collection of 600+ amazing INSPIRATIONAL QUOTES from great authors and speakers. Life mission statement helps you to stay focused on important things and enrich your life. A personal mission statement "provides clarity and gives you a sense of purpose." ◆ SETTING your NEW YEAR RESOLUTIONs. Aspire to work on self-improvement , be happier, get healthier, and reach your life goals and dreams! ◆ ACCESS OFFLINE – iWish works completely offline and also allows to export your data ◆ Optional PASSWORD PROTECTION. Download iWish now - enrich and energise your life! Aspire to be happier, get healthier, and reach your life goals and dreams! Love iWish? Play the ultimative soccer app for the world cup 2014 in brazil and become the flying football world champion in this brazilian adventure! An epic saga of the lost hero vs. the dangerous world! Story: In the game of his life at the world cup 2014 in brazil the tiny football Peppy is shot by a soccer player into the brasilian jungle! Fortunately he has a touch down into an ancient goal slingshot in the amazon temple area... try to run through the jungle of brazil and flick your way home to the championship bowl! But be careful there are many many risks you have to survive. It won´t be easy to fly through the jungle but with some skillful you´ll do it and all the time the landmark, the great christus figure from Rio de Janeiro will be watching you. Peppy football Rio will thrill you from the very first second. Sometimes it´s very tricky but never frustrating. Discover the dangers of the jungle. There are the angry looking monster statues, the flappy but happy birds, nasty plants, the amazon temple, golden snakes…… How to play: Touch the football Peppy in the slingshot, drag and flick the slingshot to grab the golden wings to transfrom. (Don't flick the ball with the slingshot to the left or he will directly crush!) Catch the mystic wings-ball to get Peppy tiny wings and a fluffy tail to become – Flappy Peppy! Once you transformed into Flappy Peppy, just tap to fly! Dash through the jungle of brazil and try to stay in the perfect line between angry plants, tiny birds and antique statues. Don't tap to relax your wings and dive under a bird – or crush it. (Brazilian birds really get angry by flappy intruders!) Be careful – sometimes 1 bird approaches you – sometimes there are 2 birds in your way! Collect bonus candies like the candy magnet, which pulls the the golden coins automatically, the candy slomo, which slows down the time or the candy treasure box, that doubles the coins you can collect. Don't let Flappy Peppy catch the candy speedup – it doubles your speed and it will become hard to not crush into a barrier. Cut across the crystal cave - full of diamonds and jewels and run Flappy Peppy through the ancient golden amazon temple area to collect even more coins! (The amazon temple area is full of gold coins – a good chance to boost your score!) There you will have to fight vs. plants, snakes and the giant jungle ventilator. If you crush into an angry plant, or have a clash with a bird, no sorrow, you can replay your home run – you have 100's of balls and no one dies in this game! Collect all the golden coins on your run, to achieve medals and cups rated 1, 2, and 3 stars on your achievements page! Features: One touch game play! (Flick & Fly) Amazing graphics and soundtracks! Kids friendly - no one really dies in this game, no zombies or evil monsters. Tons of funny animations, enemies and obstacles, angry plants and tiny birds! Google game service - high score and achievements! Social Sharing-Features, like „send a friend“ with the email button or share your high score on twitter to challenge your friends to beat your score! (You can share your score on twitter by touching the twitter-button in the main menu or choose the twitter-button in the game) Check out the 2 extra pages in the main menu – Options and More games from pepworks! If you want to support the developers, this game offers an in-app purchase to remove the advertising. Do you like the game? Then please write a super review it in the App Store! (Rating and reviews will help us develop more content and more levels and games) Please recommend this epic football saga to your friends and family! This game is not about football stars, soccer tables, shooting goals, angry soccer referees or goal charts. It's about having a lot of fun (on your home run) in the pauses between the soccer matches of the world cup 2014 in Rio :)

Monthly Budget is a rich mobile tool for the finance management. This application is suitable for tracing your income and expense to construct a healthy finance. You are able to use Monthly Budget app for the following needs: 1. Personal money management 2. Family budget tracking 3. Business financial planner 4. Cash organizer 5. Money saving Features: 1. Simple and beautiful user interface Adding a new transaction is fast and intuitively 2. Income and Expense log Browsing log you will be able to find each posted transaction 3. History All historical data are stored - you can choose the exact month and get overall monthly stats and records 4. Bills tracking Bills management is also easy and comfortable. You are able to set up bills you will need to pay for the exact date 5. Accounts management This feature allows you to know money amount at each of your bank account, credit/debit card, gift cards, e-money (such as PayPal or analogues system), cash and etc. You are able to provide transfers between accounts Ability to browse transactions over each account is also provided 6. Budgets tracking Set budget for any expense category and track how much money did you spent Ability to browse transactions over each budget is also provided 7. Earning planning Set plan for incomes for the exact income category and check how close you are Ability to browse transactions over each plan is also provided 8. Charts for data analyzing Graphic statistic chart present ratio of expense and helps you to review if the distribution is reasonable Analyze you monthly incomes and expenses to set up budgets you need 9. Database backup and recovery Export transaction record and monthly summery data to SD card 10. Password protection 4-PIN number to protect your personal data

***The Pirq app has been recently updated and is better than ever!*** Pirq is the best loyalty app to help you easily manage your punch cards, and find exclusive rewards and discounts from your favorite businesses! Never worry about losing a paper punch again. Pirq merchants offer 100% digital punch cards so you can easily keep all your cards right on your phone for maximum convenience. When you visit a business, simply scan their Pirq Barcode with your Pirq app to get punches as you work towards exclusive rewards for being a great customer. Speaking of exclusive rewards, many Pirq merchants offer special VIP Deals after your first punch. VIP Deals include large discounts, free offers, access to unique events, and other private offers that are not available to the general public! Pirq is also a great way to discover new businesses, and save money at the same time. We have negotiated discounts ranging from 20-50% off your total bill. No pre-paying or printing necessary! Simply find the deal you want, reserve it, and redeem it at the business. It's that simple! Start enjoying the perks of Pirq today!
release_text: - New Material Design to create a faster, smoother and richer user experience. - Now utilizes the navigation drawer instead of the bottom bar. - Main view utilizes fast action button on merchant list view to quickly do check-ins and punches. - My Punch Cards will now group all your completed cards into a "Rewards" drop down. - Share now utilizes Android share dialog so you can share to many different apps rather than just Facebook. - Bug fixes and performance improvements

description: Finally an Android application that can scan MTG ( Magic the Gathering ) cards and display their online price! Now trading cards can be done in just a few seconds, no more need to run to a laptop to search for the prices online and neither the need to write their names, just take pictures! MTGScanner is for helping you trade cards faster, in the future we could add more features, if users find it useful and like it. ******* If there are problems focusing, please go to settings ( the gear icon or menu - settings ) and try a different focus mode, MACRO should be the best one (if the camera supports it) ******* All sets are supported starting from 8th Edition (2003) to the current one, which is Conspiracy set. Cards are supported in the following languages: English, French, German, Italian, Spanish, Portuguese, Chinese, Korean, Japanese and Russian. To change the language go to settings, multiple languages can be used at the same time (for a deck with cards from different languages) but the scanner will work slower (especially on devices that don't have quad cores). The source of the prices is TCGPlayer.com, if you like this app please support it by creating an account when buying cards from within the application. Thank you! We tried to make the app work on as many devices as possible, it should work on any device with Android 4.0 and a camera, but we can't guarantee it will work on all devices. Also this app needs at least 80 Mbytes of space, if it's not free enough space, it will not work properly or it will not start. Magic: The Gathering is a trademark of Wizards of the Coast LLC. MTG Scanner is not affiliated with or endorsed by Wizards of the Coast LLC. To see how the app is doing and which features are used more, we use Google Analytics.
release_text: Version 1.4.2\n - fixed Modern Masters 2015 price issue Version 1.4.1 - added Magic Origins set - fixed card database update - fixed bug in deck creation logic - fixed set selection issue - fixed set filtering issue Version 1.4.0 - added decks, inventory and wishlist - new MTG theme/new layout - added charts & shuffle options for deck analysis - updated and improved cards database - added Modern Masters set - fixed card search issue and restart delay issue - fixed minor bugs

By the terminal "N2 TTS" is installed, install additional packages this further, five male voice of the governor will be added to the reading "N2 TTS". [Correspondence version] N2 TTS 1.4.2 or later (The use of this package, Android 4.0 or later is required.) [Usage] terminal to the "N2 TTS" has been installed, please install additional this package. [Terms and Conditions] data This package provides is true in the "N2 TTS Terms of Use" and "content". You can check the "N2 TTS", "N2 TTS Settings" → "Terms of Use" and "N2 TTS Terms of Use". In addition, we are on to KDDI R & D Laboratories Website Terms and Conditions: http://www.kddilabs.jp/products/audio/n2tts/ About the transmission of information to the outside] This application, which including (term frequency, etc.), the selection frequency information and voice quality selection history, to be sent to the external customer information from the terminal does not have the statistical information and the entered text.
