description: Enhance AWS Account Security AWS Virtual MFA is an Android application that enables you to use your smartphone as a multi-factor authentication device with AWS Multi-Factor Authentication (AWS MFA). This is an optional feature of your Amazon Web Services (AWS) account that provides increased security when accessing AWS. This feature requires the user to present a valid authentication code provided by their MFA device, in addition to their username and password, before they can sign in. Supports OATH Standard The AWS Virtual MFA application supports the OATH standard for Time-based One-Time Passwords (TOTP), and it can easily be configured by scanning a QR Code with your smartphone or by manually entering a configuration key provided by the AWS Management Console. The app supports the ability to generate one-time passwords for one or more virtual tokens, making it easier for customers who require MFA protection for multiple AWS identities. Integrate All Your Accounts You can enable AWS MFA for your AWS account as well as for any AWS Identity and Access Management (IAM) user associated under your account. All AWS websites, such as the AWS Management Console and the AWS portal, support AWS MFA.

Spades is a trick-taking card game devised in the United States in the 1930s, however the game truly took off after release as a part of Microsoft Windows in 1992. As any other successful game, millions of clones have been created on all possible platforms. So why should you give our version a try? We tried to recreate all the fun of original game in a tiny download package. The object is to take at least the number of tricks that were bid before play of the hand began. The bids and tricks taken are combined for a partnership. Spades is a descendant of the Whist family of card games, which also includes Bridge, Hearts, and Oh, Hell. Its major difference as compared to other Whist variants is that, instead of trump being decided by the highest bidder or at random, the Spade suit is always trump, hence the name. Spades overview A standard pack of 52 cards is used ranked from highest to lowest: A, K, Q, J, 10, 9, 8, 7, 6, 5, 4, 3, 2. The four players are in fixed partnerships, with partners sitting opposite each other. The first dealer is chosen at random, and the turn to deal rotates clockwise. The cards are shuffled and dealt clockwise. All four players bid a number of tricks. Each team adds together the bids - number of tricks that team must try to win in order to get a positive score. Everyone must bid a number. Players are not allowed to pass and bids once made cannot be altered. A bid of 0 tricks is known as Nil. This is a declaration that that the player who bid Nil will not win any tricks during the play. There is an extra bonus for this if it succeeds and a penalty if it fails. The partnership also has the objective of winning the number of tricks bid by the Nil's partner. The player to dealer's left leads any card (except a spade). Each player, in turn, clockwise, must follow suit if able; if unable to follow suit, the player may play any card. A trick containing a spade is won by the highest spade played; if no spade is played, the trick is won by the highest card of the suit led. The winner of each trick leads to the next. Spades may not be led until either some player has played a spade, or the leader has nothing but spades left in hand. A side that takes at least as many tricks as its bid calls for receives a score equal to 10 times its bid. Additional tricks (bags) are worth an extra one point each. A side which (over several deals) accumulates 10 or more bags has 100 points deducted from its score. Any bags beyond 10 are carried over to the next cycle. If a side does not make its bid, they lose 10 points for each trick they bid. If a bid of nil is successful, the nil bidder's side receives 100 points addition to the score won (or lost) by the partner of the nil bidder for tricks made. If a bid of nil fails - that is, the bidder takes at least one trick - the bidder's side loses 100 points, but still receives any amount scored for the partner's bid. The usual rule is that when a nil fails, the tricks won by the nil bidder do not count towards making the partner's bid, but do count as bags for the team. The side which reaches 500 points first wins the game. Don't forget to check our Game section for other fun games...

description: Welcome to the world of astronomy: planets, double stars, galaxies, nebulae. These are just some of the amazing wonders that await you when you explore the night sky. But a dark sky with seemingly countless stars can appear overwhelming. Where do you begin? Start with Discover Astronomy. For decades, the insightful editors of Astronomy magazine have been guiding observers, across the constellations, through the solar system, and into the deep sky so they can get the most from our time under the stars. And now, with this app, Northern Hemisphere observers can take expert guidance with them wherever they go. Discover Astronomy eases you into stargazing by having you get to know the night sky with just your unaided eyes and binoculars through interactive articles, videos, galleries, and star charts. What are the signpost stars and star patterns of each season? What should you observe first? How can you understand where to look when you hear about a sky event in the news? The answers are all here. After you feel comfortable with the major constellation guideposts of each season, grab your binoculars and Discover Astronomy to explore the Moon and the brightest star clusters, nebulae, and galaxies. You’ll be amazed by what simple optics can reveal. Soon you’ll be craving the views only a telescope can provide, which this app helps you with as well. Let Astronomy’s editors guide you through the buying process and get you started observing the planets, the Sun, and hundreds of stunning deep-sky objects. In no time, you’ll be exploring the sky like a pro and sharing your knowledge with others. Payment for this app will be charged to your Google Play account at confirmation of purchase. At Kalmbach Publishing, we welcome your feedback. If you experience any problems with this app, please contact us at www.kalmbach.com/apphelp. Privacy policy: http://www.kalmbach.com/privacy

With the NSA firewall, you can encrypt and decrypt any text. You can send these encrypted messages via text-message, WhatsApp for Facebook with no hassle. The recipient can only read the message, if he/she knows your secret password. If somebody should intercept the message, all he gets is gibberish. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Step-by-step instructions ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 1) Enter text, e.g. "This is a secret!" 2) Enter desired password, e.g. "Zahd&182" 3) The app decrypts your text with the password. You'll get something like: 8B3oHbLlqf/4IoawfAO9UQ== 4) Send this message to your friend. If somebody intercepts the message, he won't be able to read it. Your friend can decrypt the message by entering the secret password "Zahd&182". ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Further Details ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Of course, the recipient must have the secret password, otherwise he won't be able to decrypt the message. You should always tell the password to the recipient in person, so it can't be intercepted. The secret password is NOT stored on our servers. Encrypting messages before sending them makes it harder for espionage and other government agencies to read, than just sending them unencrypted. However, this app cannot guarantee 100% secure communications. Of course, this app can be used to send messages not everybody is supposed to read (e.g. your wife, your boyfriend or your mother). ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ Technical Details ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ We use the 128 bit AES-Process to encode messages. What Wikipedia says about AES: "The Advanced Encryption Standard (AES) is a specification for the encryption of electronic data established by the U.S. National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST) in 2001." Have fin with the app!

Pinoy Henyo is a word and mind game popularized in the Philippine’s No. 1 noon-time variety show, Eat Bulaga. The mechanics of the game is actually very simple. The guesser will hold his phone on his forehead and he will just need to guess the word. It is played by pair. The guesser and the one will give three short answers: YES (Oo), NO (Hindi) or CAN BE (Puwede). If the guesser got the word, tap the middle screen to stop the timer. Quick play – This is the fastest way to play Pinoy Henyo. Words will come from all categories. Custom Play – Here you can customize the word to be guessed, set the guessing time and you can also choose a random word from a specific category. Super Pinoy Henyo – Beware! All words in this gameplay are the hardest to guess. Words – You can edit and add a word to guess. Settings – Here you can change the default guessing time and the word’s font. DISCLAIMER: This application is NOT, in any way, related to Eat Bulaga!. No copyright infringement intended.

FsMovMap2 is now available! Check it out if you have an Android 4.0 (or higher) device! --------------------- Google Maps used as a moving map for Microsoft Flight Simulator X (tm). This program is an easy to use moving map for Microsoft Flight Simulator X (FSX). Just connect your device and your FSX machine via a (Wifi) network and your tablet or phone will feature a map for FSX displaying the planes position, the flightplan and some flight information. You can choose to fly in satellite or map view: Perfect for sightseeing and visual flights. Watch airport layouts in detail and the cities and landscapes you are flying by. A server program needs to be installed on the machine running FSX. It could be downloaded at www.rahsim.com. This app is freeware, but donations are welcome to help adding new features to the app (and you will even be mentioned on our homepage!). Any amount is appreciated :) Happy landings!

They might call you an enforcer, or an assassin. Call it what you like - you're a CONTRACT KILLER. Pulled into a world of bounty hunters, mobsters and criminals, you must check in with your contacts and accept SECRET MISSIONS that only you can handle. Select your WEAPON OF CHOICE from an inventory of sniper rifles, assault rifles and machine guns. Locate your target, zoom in, take aim and GO FOR THE HEADSHOT to earn cold hard cash. You might eliminate a crime boss and escape without being spotted, or you might walk straight into an AMBUSH... WELCOME TO CENTRAL CITY Prepare for your mission and then jump into one of many vantage points within 5 gritty 3D locations UNLIMITED MISSIONS 17 Story Missions and unlimited Random Missions provide cash, XP and lots of action DEADLY WEAPONS 20 distinct weapons including handguns, sniper rifles, machine guns and assault rifles ALIVE OR DEAD Use the Tranquilizer Gun to capture your target or put them down... permanently FOLLOW US at Twitter @glumobile facebook.com/ContractKillerGlu Use of this application is governed by Glu Mobile’s Terms of Use. Collection and use of personal data are subject to Glu Mobile’s Privacy Policy. Both policies are available at www.glu.com. Additional terms may also apply. CONTRACT KILLER is free to play, but you can choose to pay real money for some extra items.

description: One day if you are locked in somewhere… It doesn’t matter that’s real or just imagination. It doesn’t matter that’s past, present or future at all. The only important thing to you… Now… just now… You have to escape now… This version requires the purchase of some of the episodes. [Game Introduction] Room Break is an adventure game about escaping. The purpose of this game is simple. Users will be detained to certain places and situations and they need to open the door of each room and escape. Obviously, users need to figure out how to open the doors. Maybe, there are some unexpected tricks hidden.. But, it is not difficult at all. If you pay attention a little bit more, you will be able to find out all the hints that lead users to a successful break-out. All of you have different reasons, but one purpose. Escape now!! [Episode Information] Basically, there are 6 different episodes, each of which has its own unique scenario. Scenarios are designed to maximize the break-out situations and thus, make users focus on the game. And, if you escape at the end, there might be an ending you don’t expect waiting for you. [Community] Homepage – m.gameday.kr/en/android Facebook – www.facebook.com/GamedayGlobal Twitter – twitter.com/Gameday_Korea You Tube - http://youtu.be/wi2gDtiMPC8

PubMed includes more than 23 million citations for biomedical literature primarily from MEDLINE and contains references and abstracts on life sciences and biomedical topics. PubMed Search App by Sloft allows to search from PubMed online search. This app provides an easy user interface to search and view the documents. Title, abstracts , author information and web link to PubMed document.

description: **The Aetna International Mobile Assistant is for members of Aetna International plans only** The Aetna International Mobile Assistant allows you secure access your benefits information anytime, anywhere. You can log in using the same username and password that you use to access the secure member website (www.aetnainternational.com). Here are just a few of the things you can do: - Submit claims without needing to download or print any forms - Update and track existing claims - Search for health care by city and country - View your policy details
release_text: This update includes: 1. Submit, update, search, and copy claims 2. View privacy policy information 3. View custom logo and content (where applicable) 4. Security fixes

description: JAGEN is a new and exciting arcade game where you control a drone through 32 challenging levels full of surprises. Force fields, Jump Pads, Laser Barriers and much more will make it a real challenge to beat! If you love games like "Marble Madness", "Labyrinth" or "Super Monkey Ball" you will love JAGEN! JAGEN features: - 27 levels of non-stop fun - 5 unlockable bonus levels - High-quality 2D graphics - Physics-based gameplay - Immersive music and sounds - Accelerometer based controls - Optimized for HD devices Included in this game is the first episode "Planet Ecko". More episodes with exciting new features will follow soon, and new levels will be added frequently! We want this game to be a great experience for you. If you have any problems with the game, please send us an email at support@thegreystudios.com . keywords: physics, marble, madness, tilt, accelerometer, libgdx, labyrinth, maze
release_text: Version 1.1.7: - Honeycomb fix. Version 1.1.6: - Bug fix for crash on exit on some devices. PREVIOUSLY: - 7 new levels - Improved contrasts - Much smoother controls - Shorter calibration countdown - Better balanced difficulty of levels - Increased visibility of laser barriers

description: ★★★ "...a nice change to logos and movies!" - appsaurus.blogspot.sg ★★★ ★★★ 900 animations to solve! ★★★ Watch what's playing in the short animation and try to guess an associated word. The animation is your only clue! Can you guess the word? Instant Fun - No registration required. Simply download and start guessing! - Original and unique hand drawn pictures. No repeats! - 900 stages ranging from easy to tricky - Get help from Facebook or Twitter friends by sharing stages that have you stumped - Connect to Facebook to see your friends' progress in the game. Start guessing together and see who is better! If you enjoyed "4 pics 1 word", "Guess the logo", "Guess the song", "Guess the brand", "Guess the movie", try this! Customer Reviews: "Not every game has to have layers of elements and features to it, or a deep backstory with multiple characters. Some games can be incredibly simplistic yet just as good, or better than, their more-involved counterparts. This is exactly the case with this app which is why it receives such incredibly high customer ratings." - apppicker.com "The game is well designed, uses nice colours, and you can tell effort has gone into making it. .. Its a nice change to logos and movies!" - appsaurus.blogspot.sg "It's a very clever idea that exceeds due to the pure simplicity it offers." - cakelessroses.blogspot.sg "The app was obviously created with both practicality and beauty in mind, and the layout and appearance of What’s Playing are simply excellent." - TheiPhoneAppReview Whats Playing is a perfect brain teaser game for the whole family! Play for free today! We value your feedback and suggestions. Write to us at support@violetarts.com . Join the What's Playing Community on Facebook: http://facebook.com/whatsplayinggame Be the first to know about our game updates! Follow us on Twitter @violetartsteam

Kids Connect The Dots Game Fun4Kids Honey Bee Kids Educational Apps Keep your kids entertained while improving their letter and number recognition skills. Fun4Kids Connect the Dots has high quality educational images with a kid-friendly sensitive touch interface specifically designed for preschool children. Kids Connect The Dots Game includes 75 puzzles. Kids Connect the Dots has a simple intuitive interface for children. The dots may be chosen to show lower-case letters, upper-case letters or numbers. Kids can connect the dots by finger dragging from one dot to another. Visual Ques highlight the next dot to connect. When all the dots are connected, the High Definition image of the educational object appears. The delightful experience includes counting numbers/letters as well as the pronunciation of the visible object to enhance the learning experience. This application helps developing your kid's imagination and reinforces the fundamental concepts such as sequencing numbers or letters. Application Features: * 75 high-quality unique HD images * Plays the object sounds when completed * Random starting points * Highlights the next dot as a visual cue after 10 seconds * Plays the numbers or letters as you connect the dots * Ad-free kid friendly application by Fun4Kids Fun4Kids Educational Applications are endorsed by thousands of satisfied parents, teachers and kids from all over the world. Please reach us @ honeybee@mobyport.com for any feedback and support! We are committed to providing fun and educational experiences to support your kids' education.

Aplicatia contine orele de sosire ale mijloacelor de transport in comun in toate statiile de pe teritoriul Bucurestiului, insa si ale liniilor preorasenesti. Aplicatia contine deasemenea si orele mijloacelor de transport in comun din timpul noptii. Informatiile din aceasta aplicatie sunt pur orientative, ele nu sunt oficiale! Nu suntem raspunzatori pentru eventualele intarzieri ale mijloacelor de transport in comun survenite din diverse motive! Aceasta aplicatie nu are nici o legatura cu Regia Autonoma de Transport Bucuresti! Orele de sosire ale mijloacelor de transport in comun sunt calculate dupa un algoritm matematic propriu! Dezvoltatori: - Cococi Alin-Gabriel - Armanda Daniel-Mihai

Who doesn't love tracking fitness activity? If you have a Fitbit tracker and are into weight loss and exercising this app is for you! Fitwatchr combines Fitbit’s daily calorie tracking feature with scientific formulas, motivating you to lose weight, earn extra calories, and achieve your weight loss goals. Featuring an all-new redesign! Current Features: - Connect your Fitbit account to Fitwatchr - Exercise, then sync your Fitbit device - Use Fitwatchr to review each day's exercise: - NEW! Other Fitbit data points, such as steps, distance, and sleep have been added, giving you all the Fitbit data you care about! - See Weight Loss Activity Conversion values, which work with leading weight loss number systems. - See Total calories burned, Daily calorie baseline (based on age, weight, height, gender and activity level) and Extra calories earned (total burned minus daily baseline). - See Activity minutes across 3 levels of intensity - Activity data stored in app for offline viewing Compatible with all wearable Fitbit trackers. Fitwatchr is not affiliated with weight loss programs or Fitbit. Activity Point calculations are approximate and based on data taken from your Fitbit device. Created by @dotNetkow, a proud Fitbit and WeightWatchers user. Marketing and design by Universald, Inc. Keywords: Fitbit, fitness, weightloss, weight loss, weightwatchers, health, dieting, diet, active link, activelink, myfitnesspal, nike+, jawbone up
release_text: Happy 1 year anniversary! - Added user's country to Settings screen - Updated "Log Points" button to direct users automatically to the France, Australia, Germany, Spain, Ireland, and South America Weight Watchers mobile site based on "Country" set in Fitbit profile. (In addition to USA, UK, and Canadian sites) - Fitbit syncing help link fixed

Nice rotating cube on your screen, with pictures or photos from phone gallery (camera and others) and pictures from Picasa web collection. description: A flashcard trainer which uses a Google Spreadsheet as a source for your learning data. Easly upload your vocabulary-lists to Google Docs (or create them with it) and than import your spreadsheets with this app to your phone as a flash-card trainer. Features: update from GDocs, Text-to-Speak, Powerlearning, Image trainers, Auto-Modus, and a lot more Of course you can learn pretty much anything besides vocabulary Attention: You can NOT create your learning content with this application! Please use your Desktop-PC, go to http://docs.google.com and create your learning content. Afterwards download it with this app. Please check out the help-pages (click on the menu-button to get there). the help-page for the browser: http://elibera.com/android/flashcard/ To deactivate the waiting time: Go to the settings-menu - "Levels - waiting time" and deactivate the waiting-time. Afterwards you have a session based learning experience.
release_text: - option to deactivate the waiting time - due to multiple user requests - new learning option: "unchanged" --> card remains in box - Bug with Android 4.0 and authentication -> fixed now - new picasa import options

description: Battery Indicator Free - it's easy , free app that shows information about the battery in the status bar. This application will help you if you are not satisfied with the standard battery indicator of your device . - Futuristic Digital LED battery level indicator , with percent. - Adjust the display , change the numbers theme , customize the application as you will be comfortable ! - The indicator color changes depending on the charge level of the battery. - Accuracy up to one percent. - Six different themes! - The application is constantly improving, all for you! - Same minimalistic cool Widget! - WITHOUT ADS - Low battery level notification Three themes were added! Do you want to use this app in your language ? Send mail to diezgames@gmail.com Keywords: LED charge status of the battery level battery indicator status widget

＊It is free for everyone and it is safe for the ladies!!＊ StarTalk is a communication app that can be used by simply registering your nickname. StarTalk Features: ＊Talking with Friends ・You can communicate with your friends by sending messages and your own stickers! ・You can change the settings and read the receiving messages without letting others know that you have already read the messages ＊You Can Change the Theme Colors, Fonts, and Backgrounds as the Way You Like! ・You can set the pictures or images as your background! ・You can change and use cute font so enjoy your own customization! ・There are seven theme colors available! So please try out and pick your favorite color! ＊You Can Keep Connecting with Friends Who You Trust! ・If you meet a new friend on this app, you two become “TempFriend” and your conversation with a new friend will be limited. ・You can connect with friends by using QR code or search your friend’s ID! ＊Group Talk Function ・You can talk to your friends who are in the same group at the same time. Oh, you have more than 100 members in your group? NO PROBLEM! ・You can create the group as many as you like so you can do so by topics and have conversations with friends! ＊The Full Text Searching Function ・You can search all the messages which you have exchanged with your friends in the past and read again so you can bring back your memories easily! ＊Favorite Function ・You can save specific messages and pictures as “Favorite” so you can bring those back faster and whenever you like! ＊As with any other apps, data transfer fees may be incurred. We therefore recommend using these services on unlimited mobile price plan. *Regarding the customer support e-mail, we are able to offer in Japanese and English languages only. We are sorry for the inconvenience and thank you for your understanding.

Did you know that your mobile can speak Australian English? Have Olivia read aloud texts from your e-book, navigation, translation and other apps in an Australian English female, high quality and natural-sounding voice powered by SVOX. When combined with TTS-enabled apps, Olivia can: - give directions, allowing you to keep your eyes on the road while you're driving - read a notification containing the caller / sender's name, and read the content of an incoming call / sms / mms / email - read aloud your favorite e-books or pdf documents - help you learn English by reading aloud the correct pronunciation and much more… the possibilities are limitless! Browse http://svoxmobilevoices.wordpress.com for a list of compatible apps and voice demos. NEW! Pronunciation correction feature: correct the default output according to your preferences! == INSTRUCTIONS == 1. Install and run the voice app once 2. Install free SVOX Classic Text-to-Speech Engine 3. Go to Android Settings -> Voice Input & Output -> Text-to-Speech settings. Activate SvoxClassic at the bottom of the screen. Select SvoxClassic as the Default Engine. 4. Run the voice app, click “Continue”, then follow the instructions. 5. Your SVOX Voice main screen will be now visible. Don’t forget to try the new pronunciations correction feature (‘pencil’ icon)! 6. Download other free / paid apps to combine our voice with. For example, you could try: Google Navigation (on Android 2.2 and later, only with Navigation < 5.9), Moon+ Reader PRO, Voice Actions Plus, TalkToMe Classic, Book Speech Audio Books, Transzilla, Good Morning, WakeVoice... Browse http://svoxmobilevoices.wordpress.com/faq/ for a list of frequently asked questions. And now … enjoy your new SVOX voice! == PRONUNCIATION CORRECTION FEATURE - HOW TO == 1. Run the voice app 2. Click on the ‘pencil’ icon. The pronunciation correction screen will now be shown. 3. Tap on the Android menu key and select ‘Help’ == NOTES == 1. Google Navigation requires that the Text-to-Speech voice matches the phone language. You can change the phone language in Android Settings -> Language & keyboard -> Select language Compatible with Google Navigation version < 5.9 2. On Android 2.1 and earlier, only some apps, like Google Translation, support changing voices.
release_text: - Resolved issue with the status bar notification that was always telling users to reinstall the application.

description: Don't forget to check out the Free DLC for over 60 absolutely free levels! == !!! VERSION 1.1 !!! == - Free DLC !!! - over 50 new levels! - Enabled installing to SD - Fixed orientation switching == !!! VERSION 1.1 !!! == Saving the day the McPixel way! McPixel is a save-the-day guy that you guide through short challenges in an oldschool point'n'click fashion. The goal in each challenge is to prevent stuff from blowing up using available tools! You have only 20 seconds to save the day! Think quick! === NOTES === CyanogenMod 10 issue: There's a bug that makes the game crash because of messed up sound driver thingie. Update to the latest nightly CM10 build or downgrade to CM9!

Devious Dungeon is a medieval action platforming game by the creators of Random Heroes and League of Evil! The catacombs under the Kingdom are infested with evil creatures. You must venture deep within the dungeons eliminating the threat! Slay monsters, collect loot, level up and upgrade your gear. Only a true champion will be victorious! Features - Level randomization - 5 worlds - Slay monsters and collect loot! - Lots of weapons and gear - RPG styled upgrades - Boss Battles - Mission system - Achievements "Devious Dungeon is Ravenous's best game since League of Evil." - TouchArcade 4/5 "Blending tight controls with the ever-shifting level design of a roguelike, Devious Dungeon is the perfect procedural platformer." - AppSpy 5/5 "The controls are precise, it's easy to jump in and start playing, and there's tons of content to explore." - CNET 4.5/5
release_text: Added an option which allows players to change the size of the on screen buttons.

description: Imagine that, you need to do something or go somewhere, but you do not want, and the rain fell, and the clothes are not ready, as the signs of destiny say - don't go! But there you go! Your cloth is wet, and it turns out that this visit was not required. Are you familiar with this situation? It is at such moments, us sometimes so lacking additional signs of fate, at least one that would help decide whether to do this or that action in certain situations. And sometimes the responsibility for decisions is too large for one person. Remove the responsibility from the shoulders and ask for advice, you can from our application! It is for such decisions and there - Magic Ball! Magic Ball can look into the future and provide an answer to any question. But before the curtain to reveal a secret you need, focus and mentally formulate a question that you can answer "yes" or "no". Responsibility of the final decision and consequences associated with it, carries the user of the application. What would you like to complete this application? All requests please, leave in comments.

description: TIVAManager is created for monitoring of calculated perioperative concentration of anesthetics and neuromuscular blocking agents in blood plasma. It can be used for planning and optimization of anesthesia course, sedation and neuro-vegetative blockade in intensive care unit. Work of the program based on pharmacokinetic compartmental models.

description: Learn Java programming skills with our hands-on course! Our interactive lessons will teach you Java skills step-by-step from ground up. You will learn how to write and run real Java programs directly on your device. You can also use this app offline to learn on the go. The Playground allows you to test your own Java code snippets, with real-time error checking, code completion just like in a full-grown programming environment. Java programming skills are the foundation for a wide range of software development areas, including Android app development and enterprise software development. Start learning today! To get access to all lessons a subscription is required. description: Willkommen bei der kicker Fußball, Sport und News App (jetzt auch für Android Wear auf Ihrer Smartwatch nutzbar)! Wir bieten viele Features zu Fußball und Sport an: Native Performance, intuitive Navigation, Live Ticker mit Konferenz und Live-Stadionbilder, Transfermarkt, Amateur Fußball Ergebnisse bis zur 10. Liga, Fußball Managerspiel, Slideshows und alle Videos von kicker.tv. Außerdem bilden wir alle Kader der Bundesligisten mit detaillierten Spielerprofilen ab. Sport Nachrichten, umfangreiche Livescores, Berichte und Statistiken aus dem weiteren Sport - beispielsweise zum Eishockey, Basketball, Handball, Tennis und Formel 1 runden die neue App ab. -- Widget & Android Wear -- Mit unserem Widget bekommen Sie auf Ihrem Smartphone immer den aktuellen Topaufmacher direkt angezeigt. Auf Ihrer Smartwatch erhalten Sie zudem Liveergebnisse, Artikel wie Topmeldungen, Slideshows und Transferticker-Meldungen (wenn eingestellt zu Ihrem "mein kicker" Verein) sowie Push-Mitteilungen angezeigt. -- Immer aktuell: Der Liveticker in der App Im Liveticker informiert die App über Aufstellungen, Tore, Karten und alles weitere u.a. in folgenden Wettbewerben: Bundesliga, 2.Bundesliga, 3.Liga, Regionalliga, Champions League, Europa League …und natürlich von allen Spielen der deutschen Nationalmannschaft - nicht nur bei Weltmeisterschaften, Europa League oder Champions League. Darüber hinaus gibt es einen Sport Liveticker zu vielen anderen Sport Ereignissen! (Formel 1, der Tour de France, Olympia,Tennis, Eishockey, Basketball, Handball) -- Fußball Ergebnisse bis runter in die 10. Liga Bundesliga, 2.Bundesliga, 3.Liga und alles aus der Regionalliga! Mit der kicker-App bleiben Sie im Fußball nicht nur in der Bundesliga, der Champions League und bei der Nationalmannschaft mit dem Liveticker und den aktuellsten Fußball Nachrichten als Text und im Video auf dem Laufenden. Sie erfahren auch alles Wissenswerte zur 2.Bundesliga, zur 3.Liga und zu den Regionalligen. Fußball Ergebnisse und Tabellen finden sie darüber hinaus zu über 1600 Amateurligen Deutschlands mit über 23.000 Fußball-Vereinen. -- mein kicker App-Personalisierung Sie wollen Ihre App personalisieren? Kein Problem: Durch den intelligenten "Mein kicker"-Bereich können Sie ihre Lieblingsvereine auf die Startseite platzieren und auch die wichtigsten Fußball Nachrichten und Infos zu ihrer Lieblingsliga abrufen. Selbstverständlich sind Push-Benachrichtigungen direkt für einzelne Partien oder Vereine aktivierbar. -- Fußball Managerspiel Schnell die Aufstellung ändern oder die Punkte erfahren: Die kicker-App jetzt auch mit dem original kicker Fußball Managerspiel. Fußball Nachrichten: Immer rundum und topaktuell Fußball News und Fußball Ergebnisse von ihrem Lieblingsverein und allen Vereinen der Bundesliga! Live Ticker : Wissen, was im Stadion passiert: Der Live Ticker informiert mit allen Infos zum Spiel und Bildern direkt vom Rasen. Transfermarkt: In unserem Transfermarkt werden alle wichtigen Ligen innerhalb der kicker Wechselbörse abgebildet. --"Mein kicker": Ein umfassendes Angebot, in dem Sie dank der "Mein kicker"-Funktionen eigene Schwerpunkte setzen können. Sie haben die neuesten Entwicklungen bei ihrem Verein direkt im Blick, egal ob Bundesliga, 2.Bundesliga, 3.Liga oder der Regionalliga. Lassen Sie sich zudem per Alert auf Spielereignisse im Liveticker hinweisen - konfigurieren Sie, zu welchem Anlass Sie von welchem Verein oder Spiel Alerts erhalten wollen. -- Zugriff auf das kicker Fußball Managerspiel Als Highlight für alle Teilnehmer am kicker Fußball Manager bietet die App Zugriff auf das eigene Team und die Auswertungen des Fußball Managerspiels. Stellen Sie ihre Managerspiel Mannschaft mobil auf und erfahren Sie an jedem Ort, wie ihre Spieler gepunktet haben. Die Zugriffsmöglichkeiten stehen Ihnen für alle Varianten des Fußball Managerspiels zur Verfügung - egal ob Bundesliga, 2.Bundesliga, 3.Liga oder auch Weltmeisterschaft. description: *** Acclaimed Tron-like graphics with smooth gameplay *** NeonBlaster is the smashing new brick blasting action game inspired by Atari's Arkanoid. Featuring cool glowing graphics with a neon-inspired retro twist and sleek special effects. Get hours of intense action with fluid, intuitive touch controls and unlimited gameplay. androidrundown.com says - "This game is a gem among a huge pile of stones" (bit.ly/IJNcVg) NeonBlaster features loads of bonus items and brick types for varied gaming experience. Campaign mode provides you 60 different levels to be unlocked. The game also features an unlimited arcade mode for your gaming pleasure. The game supports both local and global leaderboards. Match up against the best scores around the world!!! (powered by openfeint). With smooth intuitive touch controls, cool glowing effects, particles and other special effects, its the ultimate addictive retro fun. Get it now and get hooked :) Game features: > Sleek graphics with retro glow effects. > Loads of special effects. > 60 levels in campaign mode alongwith unlimited arcade mode. > Smooth, intuitive controls. > Fun bonus/brick types. > Support for global leaderboard. > Sound effects/vibrations. > Particle effects.

Next, add awesome, animated effects to your recorded videos. If you don’t want to go freestyle and customize on your own, we made it easy for you! Dizionario Inglese-Italiano offline Offline English-Italian Dictionary * More than 57.600 words and expressions * Bookmark your favorite translations for fast reference * Works offline! No internet connection needed! The perfect translator for your trips or when no data connection is available * Listen to the correct pronunciation in British or American English and Italian using Android's built-in Text-to-speech synthesizer. * Share translations by SMS, email, etc. This version is supported by ads. If you like the application, please consider upgrading to the ad-free version to support the development. Thanks :) FAQ: Q: How can I share a translation? A: Just press 2-3 seconds over the translation and you will be presented with a menu with all available sharing options based on the apps installed in your device (Email, SMS, Facebook, etc) Q: How can I change the speed of the voice? A: The speed of the speech is controlled by the TTS engine installed with Android. It can be set up by going to: Settings --> Voice input & output settings --> Text to speech settings --> speech rate Q: I don't like the voice. How can I improve it? A: The default text-to-speech engine installed with Android is Pico TTS, it’s pretty simple and sometimes may sound a bit electronic. You can always install alternatives like eSpeak, SVox or IVONA from Google Play. Please check our blog post about this subject: http://www.movinapp.com/talking-android Q: How can I change the speech language? A: Just go to Menu --> Settings and select the language. Currently, 3 languages are available: * English (US) * English (GB) * Italian DISCLAIMER: The text-to-speech (TTS) technology may not be available in some devices. To check if your phone is able of speech synthesis: Menu -> Settings -> Voice input & output -> Text-to-speech settings. If not installed, your device may ask you to install the TTS engine. An internet connection may be required. We recommend installing it before traveling as roaming data tariffs may be very expensive.

Collect your units, create your army, deploy your legions and work your strategy to battle the opponents pieces and capture their castle! Armies of Zatikon combines trading card collectibility, dynamics and variety to Chess board strategy! Rush your enemy with speedy Rangers combined with the all-powerful Dragon and steadfast Pikemen, or slowly advance with the mighty Necromancer and the Zombies and Skeleton Warriors he conjures! Back him up with any number of units from Angels, Soldiers, Knights and Martyrs to Demons, Barbarians, Fire Archers, and Heretics! With over 100 unique pieces, no game is ever the same, whether in single player against the AI computer, online 2 vs 2, online player vs player constructed, or even in joining a friend to play together vs the computer! Use powerful "relic" cards/pieces to add abilities to your units, to your teammates pieces, or even to trade control of pieces with them! Random mode let's you play with pieces you haven't yet collected, against the computer, against a friend, or with them! With so many play modes, Armies of Zatikon always has a new fun strategy awaiting you. Check out these amazing features: - Free to Play! - Single player mode vs the Computer AI- win gold! - Online player vs player: Multiplayer matchmaking - Online 2 player vs 2 player: Join a friend and form a double sized army to take on another 2 player team! - Online Cooperative Mode: Join a friend to combine armies and play against the Computer AI together. - Random Mode Play: Player vs Player (PVP) with random generated armies, single player vs the computer, or with a friend vs the computer. - General Chat as Well as In-Game Chat - "Retro" style art and animations - "Turn-based Strategy" combining trading card game dynamics with the 3 phases of Chess: Opening, Mid -game, End game- Capture the Castle! - Easy to learn, hard to master! Unlimited strategies and tactics! - Collect and Create your own armies: Carefully choose your pieces for your custom strategy, and save it. Up to 10 armies can be saved at a time! - The first game play based on Magic the Gathering (MTG) combined with Chess! - Over 100 unique units in categories like Dark Mages, Light Mages, Siege, Nature, Soldiers, Commanders, Archers, Clergy, Cultists, Horsemen, and Wyrms! - Based on a historical medieval period, Armies of Zatikon is a fantasy game unlike any other, with a feel of the forces of good and evil clashing in battle!! - Earn free units as you win matches and progress against the computer or online foes. Sell units back and save towards others like the Dracolich or Dragon!!! What people are saying about Zatikon: "Extremely fun....pretty much an endless combination of ways to both compose your armies as well as using them in the game." - Game Tunnel "Zatikon is a highly replayable and addictive game that rewards thoughtful play." - Steve Blanch - Bytten "An excellent mixture of elements of turn-based strategy and Chess." - Baixaki (Portuguese) "A superb turn-based strategy title...tons of extremely creative characters with interesting special abilities." - Jay Is Games "If you like strategy/war type games you should check out Zatikon" - "Casual gamer chick" Originally created by Chronic Logic Games in 2001 and now brought to mobile by Triceratapps Publishing 13 years later, "Armies of Zatikon", originally just "Zatikon", was built when Magic the Gathering collectible trading card game was at its height. Using retro style graphics and turn-based gameplay formed on the 3 chess game phases: "The opening, The Middle Game, and "The End Game", Zatikon was a PC and Mac MMO hit for Chess players, Magic fans, Trading Card Game (TCG) and Collectible Card Game (CCG) players, and even Role Playing Game (RPG) fans alike! Where Strategy meets Fantasy, and Chess meets Cards is where Armies of Zatikon meets Mobile!

QuickNote is a very useful tool in android market. You can write notes, messages, ideas, shopping list and to do list in QuickNote by different category. What's more, QuickNote approved that info sync with Google task, letting your notes info more securer and convenient to check at anywhere. We are sure that QuickNote will be your good partner and friend in work and life. Key features: - Add sticky note widget to your desktop, easy to open and edit. - Setting reminder in your notes, you will never forget your important things. - Search notes by keywords in your content. - It Can be organized in folders, easy to classified your notes. - Checklist notes for To do list & Shopping list. - Five kinds of notes background color available to change as you like. - Auto-saved - Share your notes via email, SMS, and etc. - Sync your notes to Google task. More advanced features, please have a try, and you'll like it!

Daum Mail - The smartest mail app The new Daum Mail app is a powerful e-mail client that helps you to manage all of your e-mail accounts & messages in one app! It supports many email services via standard Internet email protocols: IMAP/SMTP/POP3. No additional fee for using our special features. It's 100% FREE! 1. Check all your e-mail messages in one App! It's an e-mail collector that gathers all of your e-mail messages(from work, school, Gmail, Yahoo, AOL, Hotmail, etc.) in combined client. 2. For @daum.net and @hanmail.net domain, there is no necessity to send separate messages to your friends& colleagues to make sure if they have read you emails. From now on, Daum Mail app will inform you! 3. Just swipe your messages to Archive or Delete. To change the default setting(Swipe to Delete), go to Settings and select 'Swipe to Archive'. 4. Easily categorize your messages in 4 types of filter : Starred, Attached, Unread and To Me! Check all of your Starred messages in one page by a single click. 5. View your messages by conversation. Check your sent & received messages in thread view. 6. Fun stickers! Use them when writing to your loved ones. 7. Optimized view for tablet users. Feel the maximized user-experience with a wide tablet view. 8. Customize the font size of your email (both title and text). 9. Set your own Signatures to express your identity or character, which will be shown at the bottom of your email. Your email addresses and passwords are safely encrypted on your device. Daum Mail app requires Android 2.3.3 Gingerbread or higher. (Swipe function, scrollable&resizing Widget needs 3.0 or higher OS version) If you have any inquiries or inconveniences, visit Daum Customer Service Center. * Support : Google Gmail, Yahoo mail, AOL(America Online) mail, iCloud, Microsoft Hotmail, Outlook, MSN, GMX, Naver, Daum (hanmail), Nate, QQ, 163, 126 and more. Daum Customer Service Center - FAQ: http://cs.daum.net/m/faq/site/266 - Contact us: http://cs.daum.net/m/ask?serviceId=266&categoryId=14495

Screen incoming calls - avoid telemarketers, phone spammers, and others you don't want to talk to with ease. And best of all - there's no subscription fee! Instantly get the location of the incoming call when the phone rings (in the US, that's "City, State"). Works for 200+ countries - including the US, India, Australia, UK, just to name a few. Got a call from "Tokyo, Japan" and you don't speak Japanese - don't answer. Works offline! No data service required. Works on CDMA carriers (Verizon, Sprint, etc) that don't have data service during voice calls. If there is data service, looks up the exact name of the caller (person or business). This works for many numbers in 14 countries (listed below). Got a call from "Joe's pizza" and you didn't order a pizza? Send that to voicemail. Displays a map of the incoming caller's location, too. Speaks the incoming caller info aloud, first checking your contact list, then offline location search, then online search. When it's 9pm on a Friday, and your phone is across the room, and you hear "Call from Work" you know not to bother getting up. If you hear "Call from White House" you may want to answer that one. The talking caller ID feature is great for in the car; the phone will tell you aloud who is calling so you can keep your eyes on the road. Countries with detailed business/personal information: Australia Austria Belgium Canada Denmark Finland France Germany Italy Luxembourg Portugal Sweden Switzerland United States The application is Free Software available under the GNU GPLv3 license. The source code is available at http://www.integralblue.com/callerid-for-android/ Grab the code and submit some patches (bugfixes, features, easter eggs, whatever) if you feel so inclined! If you have a problem with the app, please contact me and let me know! I do my best to make customers happy. Permissions ––––––––––––– • directly call phone numbers: in the app, you can view recent calls, select an entry, and call it. • full Internet access: needed to do online lookups • read contact data: lookups are only done for incoming phone numbers that aren't in your contact list. Also, when the phone is ringing, the caller's name can be read aloud - and the contact list information is preferred over geographical or online lookups • read phone state and identity: needed to tell when the phone is ringing so the lookup can be performed • display system-level alerts: needed to display call information on the incoming call screen
release_text: Reduced APK size Fixed bugs with number and address caching which could cause ANRs Fixed crash when using the add contact button after performing certain lookups

description: THINK IT! CREATE IT! SOLVE IT! The award-winning, best-selling video game is now available for Android tablets and phones! Help Maxwell acquire the Starite by creating any object, bringing it to life and using it to solve each challenge. Let your imagination run wild in this groundbreaking puzzle game. Summon to life a ‘colossal, winged car’ or a ‘shy, frost-breathing, robotic hippopotamus’! If you can think it, you can create it. It’s the perfect game for the casual player looking for fun and extensive replay with unlimited solutions and different outcomes. Or, the Scribblenauts fan wanting the complete Maxwell experience. Whether you’re 8 or 80, the only limit is your imagination! ============================================================================ And, the critics love it! > “Editors’ Choice Award” – IGN.com > “A work of utter genius.” – Touch Arcade > “A brilliant game.” – Wired.com > “4/4 Stars. A highly recommended puzzle game for all ages.” – USA Today ============================================================================ FEATURES: CLASSIC GAMEPLAY 50 levels to play! Includes 40 of the most popular levels from Scribblenauts and Super Scribblenauts and 10 original levels exclusive to Remix. WORLD PASS Purchase a World Pass and receive all current and future world expansions - 40 extra levels and counting! If you previously purchased a world expansion, you’re automatically upgraded to a World Pass and all future worlds will now automatically appear in your game for free. INNOVATIVE USER INTERFACE Use the “shake to undo” function to remove created objects simply by shaking your Android device. Create what you want and see what happens! Hang out with Maxwell! > VISIT Maxwell:: www.scribblenautsremix.com > LIKE Maxwell:: www.facebook.com/ScribblenautsVideoGame > FOLLOW Maxwell: http://twitter.com/ScribbleMaxwell

يأتى برنامج ذاكر بـ أذكار اليوم و الليله لكل مسلم حيث يتضمن البرنامج عرض رائع بـ خلفيات متحركة طبيعيه من سحب و أنهار و بحارو غابات استوائيه مع أصوات هادئه للطيور و العصافير و صوت الامواج الرقيقه مع أنشودات الشيخ مشارى راشد العفاسى و النقشبندى . يعرض برنامج ذاكر الاذكار مثل : - أذكار الصباح - أذكار المساء - أذكار الصلاة ( الاذكار قبل و بعد كل صلاه ) - اذكار النوم - اذكار منوعة البرنامج هو وسيلة سهلة لكل مسلم يريد الحفاظ على صلته بالله عز و جل و تلهيه مشاكل الحياة و عمله عن تذكر هذة الصله بالله عز و جل . لذلك يأتى برنامج ذاكر بوسيه للتذكير بالاذكار ذات المواعيد مثل : - أذكار الصباح - أذكار المساء - أذكار النوم فيقوم البرنامج بالتذكير بتلك الاذكار فى مواعيد محدده بأصوات و أدعيه اسلامية للشيخ مشارى راشد العفاسى . مميزات البرنامج : - طريقة عرض مختلفه من نوعها حيث المناظر الطبيعيه المتحركة و الاصوات الطبيعيه التى يمتزج معها انشودات و ابتهالات النقشبندى و الشيخ مشارى راشد العفاسى - امكانية تشغيل أو الغاء الصوت - امكانيه تشغيل او الغاء اى من تذكيرات الصباح أو المساء أو النوم - امكانيه مشاركه او عمل شير للأذكار مع أصحابك عن طريق الفيسبوك او تويتر او جوجل بلاس (Facebook - Twitter - Google plus) - البرنامج يمكن نقله للذاكره الخارجية . ملحوظة : - البرنامج مجانى سواء الاصدار Lite او الـ Pro ولاكن تم عمل نسخة Lite فقط بسبب حجم البرنامج حيث أن حجم البرنامج كبير جدا بسبب الاصوات و الابتهالات، فلذلك قمنا بتوفير نسخة بدون الابتهالات للأجهزة التى لا يتوافر بها ذاكره ذاكره كبيرة . - البرنامج مجانى و لاكن نظرا للمجهود الكبير المبذول فيه من تطوير و ديزاين و مونتاج يتم فقط وضع بعض الاعلانات التى تساعدنا فى تطوير و متابعه البرنامج . - البرنامج لايوجد به أى فيروسات و لكن الاعلانات الموضوعه تحتاج أحيانا لبعض السماحيات او ال permissions لكى يظهر الاعلان المناسب لك حسب الدولة مثلا .. لذلك لاتنزعج من اى تنبيه كاذب من برامج مكافحة الفيروسات .

The BMO Retirement App is a read-only App that lets you view your retirement account and current plan information any time from your Android™ smartphone. To complete transactions in your account, please visit mybmoretirement.com. With the BMO Retirement App, you get hands-on access to your retirement savings. - Check your account balances - View investment price/performance - Review contribution rates - See how your account is currently allocated - View your personal rate of return - Verify loan balances - Look at your account activity Your account’s security is important to us. You are required to have established a User ID and Password on the mybmoretirement.com website prior to accessing the mobile App. Once a User ID and Password have been established, the same credentials will apply to both the website and mobile App. For questions or additional information about your retirement plan, please choose the most convenient way of contacting us. This information is also available in the App by tapping the “i” Info icon. - Call the My BMO Retirement Line at 1-800-858-3829. For the automated telephone service to access your retirement plan account information, press 1. To speak to a BMO Retirement Services Specialist, press 2. Call us 24 hours a day, seven days a week at your convenience. - Email a BMO Retirement Services Specialist at mybmoretirement@bmo.com . A BMO Retirement Services Specialist will reply within 24-48 hours during the normal business week. Please be aware the email you are sending is not secure, so don't include confidential information such as passwords, account numbers and Social Security Numbers.

Don't Tap the Odd Tile is a fun and addictive game similar to the games where you must not tap the white tile except in this game, you are not allowed to tap the odd Tile (1,3,5,7,9 etc). * Time Challenge You must score as much as possible before the time runs out. You can add time by collecting the orange tiles. You also get extra time for every 10 points you score. *Arcade You must tap only the even tiles while they scroll down the screen. The scrolling gets faster and the numbers become more complex as you try to survive. * Math Mode You must tap tiles which add up to an even number. for example 1+1 is correct before it equals 2 wile 4-3 is not correct because it equals 1 which is not an even number

Create your own definition of common words and share them with the community! Here is a tiny glimpse of the definitions contained in the application: ✓ Toes: Appendages for detecting door corners. ✓ Tie: Arrow pointing to the brain of the man. ✓ Parents: two people who teach you to walk and talk just to ask you to sit down and shut up afterwards. ✓ Santa Claus: Character invented by parents whose non-existence is revealed when gifts become too expensive. ★ Submit your own definitions! ★ Here is a list of the latest top definitions! ✓ Keychain: Handy invention that allows losing all keys at the same time ✓ Cleaning: Action of moving dirt across the room ✓ Alzheimer: I don’t know, can't remember anymore ✓ Religion war: War waged to find out who has the best imaginary friend ✓ Death: Expiry date of the 'Life' product ✓ Life: Fatal disease, sexually transmitted ✓ Easy opening: Invented by somebody who never tried his invention! ✓ Car: May hold 250 horses in the engine and a donkey at the wheel. ✓ Work: Activity designed to remember why vacation exists ✓ Bed: Place you rarely get tired of Once you register, you will have an account to create your own rant and vote on the best rants and comment as well as the rants of your friends! description: WARNING: Highly Addictive Zombie Match 3 Game! From Noodlecake Games and Massive Damage, the folks that brought you Please Stay Calm and Super Stickman Golf 2 comes a new spin on match 3 with 1000% more zombies and guaranteed no candies! Explore a retro post-apocalyptic world full of zombies in a bid for survival in this challenging and addicting puzzle adventure. Will you survive? - PLAY through tons of levels of zombie puzzle madness! - MATCH powered up items for INSANE COMBOS! - FUN to play but challenging to master! - FIGHT multiple types of puzzle zombies, some even affect the puzzle board! - EARN sniper shots, grenades and bodyguards to help you beat the tough levels! - EXPLORE a beautiful 1950s retro-styled post-apocalyptic world - COMPETE against your Facebook friends for the top scores! - SYNC your progress across devices using Facebook Connect LIKE us on Facebook to see the latest news, updates and concept art! facebook.com/zombiepuzzlepanic Please note: Zombie Puzzle Panic is completely free to play but some optional in-game items will require payment. You can turn off these options by disabling in-app purchases in your device’s settings. *Deleting this game from your device will erase the game’s save data.
release_text: Fixed the fire levels (level 186+) == Fixed the bug where you couldnt use your free lives == 45 New Levels (up to 230). Fire Zombies - These dastardly flaming zeds will set things on fire as they wander. description: Best mosquito repellent (Electronic repellent) application. Have you ever bitten by mosquitoes or insects bites? Mosquito Scare helps you! Mosquito Scare works with a high frequency sound (ultra sound/high-frequency ultrasonic) that most mosquitoes find distasteful and repellent by the sound and then you got protected. The sounds are undetected by the human ear. You can use it to play sounds with a frequency between 8,000 and 22,000 hertz, which will keep mosquitoes and other insects away from the location. How to use it: - It is advisable to increase the volume of the phone as high as possible and choose the best frequency for your region. - Switch different frequency to find out the suitable one for your location. - Some phone’s speaker are not supported high-frequency ultrasonic output. In this case, the Mosquito Scare won’t function properly. - Use Aggressive Mode(frequency of rotation) for multi-type of mosquitoes. - Turn on low frequency for Aggressive Mode in menu to release the biggest power. Notes: This app is a kind of Electronic repellent using high-frequency ultrasonic to prevent mosquito or insect bites. The effectiveness of this app will depend on environment, type of mosquitoes/insects. This app may also have effects on Cockroach, but this is not proved. The app plays an high frequency sound. Some people under 30 years old can hear the sound, while over a certain age (variable from person to person) the ear lose the ability to hear high frequency sounds.
release_text: V1.2.1 Fix permission issue from google play service V1.2 1. 30% smaller in total size(From 1.3M to 0.87M) 2. Add control to lower frequency in aggressive mode

The man who helped Katie Price to get her post-baby body back has designed a healthy and effective diet and exercise programme to reshape your body in just one week, but with lasting results, and all from the UK's leading health coach and seminar leader Jason Vale. Jason has designed a highly motivational and hard-hitting programme for effective speedy weight loss. The "7lbs in 7 days Super Juice Diet" can help you get in shape super-fast to give you a beach-perfect body or help you look sensational in that little black dress. With his simple diet and exercise programme and inspirational message, you will not only lose weight, but also have higher energy levels, clearer skin and be set free from the dieting trap forever. * OVER 3 MILLION JASON VALE BOOKS SOLD * OVER 1 MILLION APPS SOLD * THE RECOGNISED FACE OF JUICING WORLDWIDE App Includes: * THE FULL 7LBS IN 7 DAYS JUICE MASTER DETOX * INCLUDES ALL THE JUICE & SMOOTHIE RECIPES (with videos, text and pictures) * FULL RECIPE VIDEOS by Jason * OPTIONAL DAILY COACHING VIDEOS by Jason (as an in-app purchase) “The Jamie Oliver Of Juice” OK! release_text: All new update, completely created from scratch to support Android 5+.

description: Even children can play Sudoku. Sudoku can train the logical thinking of your kids. Sudoku Bakery is a simple Sudoku game for any kid as young as 4 years old. Help the bakery bear to arrange the positions of the lovely breads so that: - all breads in the same row are different - all breads in the same column are different - all breads in the same region are different If you are parents, you can use the hiding tools to help your kids to find out which bread is missing in a row, a column, or a region. The game starts from easy level, only one bread in each region is missing, and when your kids continue to solve the preliminary levels, the missing breads are getting more and more. But relax, the hiding tools can always help your kids to concentrate on only one region, one row, or one column so that they are able to solve the Sudoku.

This game is dedicated to all the erudite persons and lovers of intellectual online games. Ask your friends to download the app and play with them online! More downloads - more participants-more fun! Play Quiz Trivia! Prove that you are the cleverest and fastest player. Play with gamers from around the world, become the best player of month or year and find yourself in the hall of Fame! Base of questions is constantly growing. Registration takes a few minutes, or even less, and you can immediately start playing. All your achievements will be saved, and every month and every year, you can compete for the title of best player of the month or year. Quiz attracts gamers by dinamism and even strategic complexity, that chess-players will fully appreciate! Ask your friends to download the app and play with them online! More downloads - more fun! The game has a chat , click on the menu button while playing and share experiences with your opponents. Quiz Trivia is Didactic game,detecting qualities of players as attention and reaction. Quiz Trivia- a game which consists in answering the questions from various areas of knowledge. The peculiarity of this game is that several people will be trying to find out the correct word. The player who answers the question first, gets the bonus point. The player with the biggest amount of points per game is the winner. The Players are divided by rooms. There are special rooms for playing in English. Players get a question and try to answer it correctly . If the needed answer isn't done during the first period, the players get a hint. The first hint - the number of letters in answer. Then the letters one by one will be opened .Once the players give 15 correct answers, the number of points will be counted. The player with the most points wins. If two or more players score the same, then the game continues until determine the winner. If you are tired, you can just chat in the game room and try to make new friends.

This app tells you how to create your own beautiful Mermaid. It includes every step of how to crochet your own Mermaid (These are sometimes called Amigurumi.) This project is fun and simple to make. They will be great for you to give as presents, or as something unique to brighten up your own home. The app contains full instructions plus plenty of photos. It also contains tick boxes for every step, so you can record where you are up to. No more losing count of how many rows you've done! Also included is a list of the materials and tools that you need for each project, with a picture. As well as the steps for these design, there's also general crochet help included: * As glossary to explain any crochet terms. * Videos for six of the common techniques. * A guide to tools needed for crochet. The app doesn't have any annoying adverts. There's a gallery page to see the other patterns available. There is an option in the app the keep the screen on while you're using it. This allows you to keep your phone at your side to remind you of where you're up to. If you use this option then plugging in the phone's power will keep it on indefinitely. Download it now! (The app also can "install to SD card." If you need space on your phone's memory then this means it doesn't take up any space internally. It doesn't affect how the app works at all.)

Do you have lots of videos in your gallery but never share them? Many great moments are forgotten and wasted, and now it's time to revive them! Do you sometimes just miss the best moments when taking photos? Just miss it! Yea, the camera is not very fast. Visummly is a simple, fast, and convenient way to share the very moments of your experiences. It extracts and collages the frames from a video. It can also add static photos! With Visummly, you will never miss a second that matters. It is as simple as: snap a short video, select the key moments and presentation style, and share the key moments in one picture with your friends on Facebook and other social media web sites. You can also use existing videos stored in your mobile phone. Hopefully this will make you take more videos :-) Features: + The app extract frames from a video + You pick the best moments/frames from a video, arrange them into a collage + You can add static photos as well + You can change layout, background color/pattern, border width, with smooth animations. + User interface has been tailored to be easy to use and blazing fast. Confused? Click on the question marks in app to see how to use. + Sharing to Facebook and more in just one click Please send us your feedback and wish list to help us bring you better experiences: info@visummly.com
release_text: V1.1 1. Set a photo as background - just long press any photo in your collage. 2. Add gallery photos - press the PLUS button at the bottom left. 3. Added Chinese support

description: ★★★ FEATURED BY APPLE IN 151 COUNTRIES ★★★ Goop Escape is ONE OF THE BEST BRAIN PUZZLE GAMES ever. This beautiful game will make your brain tick and push the limits of your puzzle solving skills. It looks simple and is easy to play but becomes very challenging and addictive. Help miserable goops find their way to the exit gates. Goops can only be moved in 4 directions by rolling them. Once moved, goops cannot stop until they hit a wall or another goop. Plan your moves and position goops strategically to find their exits. Use teleporters to transfer goops to a different position. Avoid deadly black holes and spikes. This game will increase your spatial reasoning, analytical thinking and creativity. There are multiple solutions to most levels. Earn more stars by solving puzzles making less moves. The less moves you make and the faster you solve, the higher you score. If you are not satisfied with your score, play again and score higher to get into top rankings in the leaderboard. Got stuck? Use hints to view the steps that will guide you to a solution. description: The digital era has brought an unprecedented level of access to cheap and addictive digital entertainment, notably games. Digital game sales, proliferation of gaming platforms and integration of games into social media have resulted in the so-called 'massive backlog' phenomenon. Specifically, gamers find themselves saddled with an enormous catalog of purchased but unconsumed games. This in turn causes severe mood swing, loss of appetite, and anti-social behaviors. Kungfu Brain proposes to tackle this issue by strenghtening the pre-frontal cortex of a gamer's brain. This is achieved by training gamers to play at least two games simultaneously. The ability to effectively "simul-play" several games can potentially lead to multi-fold reduction in backlog clearing time. Kungfu Brain strives to provide an introductory training platform to kickstart the initiative. In every play session of Kungfu Brain, two mini games are randomly selected out of 5. They've very simple play rules. The difficulty ramps up gradually, and the gamers are encouraged to survive the mini games for as long as they can. It's observed that consistently playing Kungfu Brain can vastly enhance one's simul-tasking skill. If Kungfu Brain is played cooperatively by two gamers, it might hypothetically achieve the side-benefit of social or family bonding, but the validity of this claim cannot be proven either analytically or experimentally, so it's beyond the scope of this initiative.

Contribute to the map by adding your own waypoints to keep track of hunting spots, past animal harvests, and landowner contact information. Features: - Includes regulation summary for 2015 / 2016 - View WMUs on top of Google maps (map, hybrid, satellite and terrain views) - View LEH boundaries and browse the 2015 LEH summary - Select a WMU to view its summary of big-game, predator and game bird seasons - Add waypoints to the map at your current location or the centre of the map - Add waypoints to the map based on your known GPS locations - Edit the name, description, image and location of your waypoints - Store Landowner contact information in waypoints to keep track of all your hunting contacts in one place - Send your friends or family an email with your current location so they can easily find you - Use the sunrise / sunset calculator to look up legal hunting light at your location - See the current moon phase at a glance - Share waypoints via email to friends and hunting partners - Text your location to other users Pro Tools In-app purchase (one time fee): - Track your position as you hunt - get an altitude and velocity profile as well as a track overlaid on the map - Draw over the map to highlight property lines, animal patterns, or trails - Search the map for businesses or points of interest (internet connection required) - Recently viewed and favorites lists for WMUs and waypoints

description: Firefighter review material on the go! Practice Quizzes, Flashcards, Skill Sheets, Scene Checkoffs, and MORE! The Firefighter Pocketbook is a comprehensive training tool for Firefighters. If you are a student going through class you will benefit from this app. Simultaneously, so will a seasoned veteran that is trying to stay current on recent developments. The material has been prepared and verified with 2011 NFPA and IFSTA text books. Over 550 practice exam quiz questions and 700 flashcards available. The App is divided into these sections: - Study: Practice quizzes, and exam questions to keep you current. As an added bonus, 700 flashcards for review. If you are taking a class or just reviewing, these will keep you updated. Firefighting terms and reference information as well. - Checkoffs: The many different types of scenes that an emergency responder can find themselves in are included here with the ability to check off necessary functions. The checkoffs section is divided into three sections. Medical, Firefighting, and Technical Rescue. - Library: The library section contains a firefighting REFERENCE TERM section, and a FIREFIGHTER SKILL SHEETS section that includes most of the skills that any firefighter should be proficient in. Use both as a training aide. More material to come soon. 5 components differentiate us from our competitors: 1. A Bookmarking feature that allows the user to save difficult test questions, or flashcards for later study. This allows the user to tailor the experience to their needs. 2. Explanations so that the user learns from every exam question and flashcard. 3. Over 550 Exam Questions and 700 firefighting Flashcards prepared by Firefighting instructors that are involved in both EMS/Fire education, and running calls in the streets. This enables the material to be relevant for students and to prepare you for the real world. 4. A Scene Checklist section is added so that the user can review the multiple types of emergency scenes and practice situational awareness and comprehensively managing a scene. 5. Material that has been developed by Firefighting educators that are current on latest developments. Our material has been developed for the Android user and cannot be found on a website somewhere for free. Other material is built to assess, ours is built to teach. Please feel free to Email any questions or concerns to: code3apps@yahoo.com , we are always willing to help in any way. Enjoy our app and stay safe out there. Taking tests is hard! BE PREPARED.

Test your skill and logic in game of Spades! • Spades is a very popular card game. • The flexible AI adjusts to any player. • Easy-to-use, responsive controls. • Three levels of difficulty • History The goal of Spades is to reach 500 points with your team. Players sitting opposite each other play as a team. The game begins with a round of bidding. You try to predict the number of "tricks", or turns, you will win. The combined bids of two partners make a "contract". Once the bidding is completed, the partners must fulfill their contract, not the individual bids. You make a contract by winning at least a contracted number of tricks. A bid of Nil means the player will try not to win any tricks. The "trump" (or highest value) suit is always Spades. Each contracted trick is worth 10 points. If you fail to fulfill the contract, a penalty is the entire value of that contract. Each overtrick, or taking more than you bid, is worth 1 point and also earns you one "bag". Every set of 10 "bags" incurs a 100-point penalty. Winning a Nil bid is worth 100 points, failing a Nil bid is penalized by 100 points.

My Credit Cards automatically manages all your credit cards in one place! My Credit Cards will store all information related to your credit card on your android phone by automatically understanding the messages that the banks send to you without fail! Everytime you carry out a transaction or make a payment or a bill is generated for your credit card, your bank sends you a SMS informing you of that. Now, ourselves, with all thats going on in our lives and so many cards that we own anyway, it's next to impossible to keep a track of all this. They serve as good updates, but the only way for us to find out what our current unbilled is or how much payment needs to be made this month or anything else, the only way to do it maintain a ledger somewhere. My Credit Cards simplifies all this. My Credit Cards reads these SMS, understands them and collates them in one place - on your android phone. How does this work? By itself! :) On a more serious note, here's a description of how it works: - It reads incoming SMS (on installation / update, it will read SMSs in your inbox) - It sends the SMS to our server (This is a point of contention, we understand, hence, we've given our thought process below) - The server understands the SMS and reverts with the key information from it - The mobile application receives this information, performs the relevant tasks and stores the information on a local database Thats it! Whenever you open the app, all information about your credit card is organized and waiting for you... Which Credit Cards work with this app? Currently, we support the following banks: - HDFC Bank - Citibank - ICICI Bank - IndusInd Bank - American Express - Standard Chartered (Regular / Manhattan) - American Express - HSBC - SBI - Axis Bank We'll keep expanding this portfolio of supported cards - thanks to our policy of processing the SMS online on our server. Why do we send your SMSs to our server? First off, we never store / read any of your personal SMS. Our objective : To provide a consistent and un-broken experience for our customers. The problems : 1. Banks keep changing their SMS formats 2. Every bank sends 4-5 different kinds of SMSs - for transactions, for payments, for bill generation and then there are variations amongst these. Multiply that with the number of banks and we have a huge no of possibilities. Also, these are ever-changing possibiliities. Our solution : We maintain the various "parsers" (a SMS format) on our server so that we can keep them updated. In which case, all the app needs to do is, send the SMS to the server and it will always know what to do with it. Do we store any personal information about you? No. At no point in time can we identify you with any personal information like your name, mobile no, your complete credit card no or your email address. The application generates a unique identifier on your phone the first time you run it and that is the only identification token that we have.
release_text: Version 1.2 - SMS prioritization - should work now on devices where SMSs were not being read by the app properly - Bug fixes - add EMIs easily now

description: This app was made to read public data on an NFC banking card compliant with EMV norm. Infos: ---------------------------------- This application is an analysis tool for reading contactless NFC EMV credit cards data. In some new EMV card, holder name and the transaction history have been removed by issuer to protect privacy. Be sure your card is NFC compliant (NFC logo printed on them). This app is not a payment app and does not contain ads. Send me your card log and an email if you find an issue with this app. Security: ---------------------------------- • In-App purchases are only present for donation. • This app doesn't access to Internet (No Internet permission). • This app doesn't store any data on the file system. • Sources available on Github https://github.com/devnied/EMV-NFC-Paycard-Enrollment Compatible EMV cards: ---------------------------------- • Visa • American Express • MasterCard • LINK (UK) ATM network • CB (France) • JCB • Dankort (Denmark) • CoGeBan (Italy) • Banrisul (Brazil) • Saudi Payments Network (Saudi Arabia) • Interac (Canada) • Discover Card • UnionPay • Zentraler Kreditausschuss (Germany) • Euro Alliance of Payment Schemes (Italy) • Verve (Nigeria) • The Exchange Network ATM Network • RuPay (India) • ПРО100 (Russia)

description: Mental Math Trainer Choose a lowest number and a highest number, the exercise will be generated with the chosen operation(or random) and 2 random numbers in the range of the numbers you chose. "Mental calculation comprises arithmetical calculations using only the human brain, with no help from calculators, computers, or pen and paper. People use mental calculation when computing tools are not available, when it is faster than other means of calculation (for example, conventional methods as taught in educational institutions), or in a competitive context." Enjoy and please rate the app! Thank you.

Play and race with fun toy Pickup Trucks - in 3D! I loved playing with toy 4WD trucks as a small child, so I worked with my children to make a simple, easy to play with toy pickup app. Each pickup truck is full 3D, with suspension, tires, headlights, and a honking horn. Play through mud and dirt in race, contest pulls, and off road rescue modes. Use taps to power up to pull out stuck car and win pulling contests! Too dirty? Run your pickup through the car wash! Select your favorite from several types and colors, then race through city, desert, snow, and even night time! Plus we added safety tips after each level for your kids to learn as they play. My three year-old loves it, and we hope your little kids love it, too! • High resolution, interactive, 3D pickup trucks with suspension and lights • Easy, clear button controls for little fingers • Safety tips to help kids learn • Lots of fun levels and different pickup trucks • Fun dirt and mud effects - plus a CAR WASH to clean your favorite 4x4!

description: Autograph V3 Manual 입니다. Autograph는 선생님과 학생에게 중고등학교 및 대학에서의 수학을 역동적으로 활용할 수 있도록 설계 되어졌습니다. -오토그래프는 학생과 교사에게 최적의 수학 교실을 만들어 줍니다. -수학 교실에 가장 이상적인 사용자 인터페이스를 지원합니다. -전자칠판과 타블렛과 함께 사용하면 더욱 편리하게 사용할 수 있습니다. (전자칠판용 화면 키보드 내장) -학습을 위해 그래프 그리기 속도를 느리게 조정할 수 있습니다. -한글 지원합니다. ---- 개발자 연락처 : SANGSANG http://www.esangsang.com Autograph V3 Manual.
